author: {'steamid': '76561198399885394', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1585396930}
review:
THE BEST WORMS for now in my opinion. 10/10

Worms Clan Wars preserves the classic charm of the Worms series with its turn-based strategic gameplay and quirky humor. The addition of clan support enhances the multiplayer experience, fostering team dynamics and competition. The extensive customization options, from team names to worm outfits, add a delightful touch. While the core gameplay remains true to the series, some may find that the formula hasn't evolved significantly. Nevertheless, the entertaining arsenal of weapons and the ability to create custom landscapes contribute to the game's replayability. Worms Clan Wars is a nostalgic and enjoyable experience, particularly for those who appreciate the franchise's signature blend of strategy and silliness.

author: {'steamid': '76561199092445489', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 6001, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5938, 'last_played': 1705388945}
review:
Игра представляет собой улучшенную версию Worms Revolution. База полностью взята оттуда и заметно улучшена графика. Изменена динамика игры. Добавлено несколько новых, полезных оружий. Произведён ребаланс червяков.
Старые 2D Worms в основном базировались на умении пользоваться верёвкой. Здесь же всё максимально упрощено. Пользоваться любым оружием не составляет никакого труда. Упор идёт всецело на всю логическую игру, нежели на единичный опыт владения тем или иным оружием .

author: {'steamid': '76561198276251740', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 1450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1374, 'last_played': 1701553794}
review:
A turn-based strategy game about worms using a plethora of different weapons to blow up each other alongside the landscape.

[hr][/hr]
If you’re not familiar with the classic Worms formular, this game basically has you control a group of worms who are placed in a two-dimensional landscape. Up to 4 pllayers take turns controlling one of their worms to move around the map and use one of a variety of weapons to damage other players’ worms. This goes on until only one player has worms left, making them the winner of the match.

There’s quite a large variety of weapons with wildly different effects, ranging from basic grenades and bazookas all the way to flame throwers, air strikes and exploding old ladies. In addition, there are also various support items, aiding you in moving your worms, setting up defensive structures and more. Crates are spawned every round, providing you with additional items, money to buy specific items with or health.

Combined, all of this makes for rather chaotic matches, which are enhanced by the gameplay being very physics-based, often leading to basic attacks triggering wacky interactions and/or chain reactions. With that said, Worms Clan Wars’ offers a lot of skill-based mechanics to master, such as aiming projectiles to account for their different trajectories and the way wind may influence them. That way, the game usually manages to strike a good balance between requiring skillful play and having randomness shake up the match, which makes for a lot of fun overall.

Clan Wars inherits the gameplay additions introduced in its predecessor Worms Revolution, adding physics objects and simulated water to maps. Each of your worms can also freely be assigned one of four classes, mixing up their abilities and adding some additional strategic elements. Clan Wars refines these features and adds some new items.

I’d suggest getting a few friends on board to get the most out of Clan Wars. Given the game’s age and the availability of never titles, the online modes are sadly basically dead and the bot AI is just too basic to play to the game’s full strength.

Aside from the multiplayer modes, there’s also a single-player campaign encompassing 25 levels, most of which put a unique spin on the basic gameplay. This campaign features some light and mostly non-sensical storytelling voice acted by Katherine Parkinson, who does a phenomenal job delivering the genuinely absurd dialogue. In a similar vein, there are an additional 10 “Worm Ops”-missions, featuring similar gameplay variations while challenging you to complete them as quickly as possible.

In typical Worms fashion, the game offers a lot of customization, letting you create custom maps with a powerful editor and create your own rulesets. For the later, you’re allowed to set various timers, adjust crate spawns, change map properties and select which items are available among other things. You can also name your worms and equip them with a number of cosmetics and voice line packs, with more of either being available through the Steam Workshop for the first time in the game series.

The updated visuals of Clan Wars barely show their age thanks to the fitting cartoonish style used, with the interface in particular feeling playful, yet snappy and readable. This is also complemented by some good if not too outstanding background music. As with the aforementioned narration, the game oozes charm, most noticeably through the worms’ animations, voice lines and of course the rather wacky weapons.

From a technical perspective, Worms Clan Wars sadly also comes with a couple of problems. For one, I had issues with tabbing out of its window resulting in crashes or the game becoming unresponsive to my inputs. Similarly, starting a match sometimes just crashes the game. In addition to these mostly avoidable obstacles, you may also encounter some glitches related to the game’s physics from time to time, like water catapulting objects or placed items floating through the level. While these mostly served to amuse me and my friend group I can very much see them annoying more competitive people.

[hr][/hr]
With all that said, I very much enjoy playing Worms Clan Wars and will recommend you give it a try if you’ve got someone to play with.

author: {'steamid': '76561198802348131', 'num_games_owned': 44, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 8151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8119, 'last_played': 1700320630}
review:
Play locally with my friends and family every now and then. There is some rare glitches/bugs where you can get a worm stuck in the walls, sent to millions of miles away etc, but those bugs are rare, and when they happen, they are more funny than anything else, at least in the context of playing IRL with friends&families. No idea how the online multiplayer works, if it even still works.

The only boring bug is when you get soft-locked in the water, where your worm move in the water with some items, creating almost end-less water waves and movement, which soft-lock the game because the end turn doesn't transition to the next in that situation until the water and items stops moving. I say soft-locked but I never encountered a direct soft-lock, the longest it took was 10 minutes of water movements, with the worms etc going back and forth with the water wave, which was quite the circus.

So yeah, out of all the Worms game, that one is a classic, and a good one. You might encounter bugs/glitches once every 2 to 3 hours, but don't recall any crash or actual game-breaking issue.

author: {'steamid': '76561198210523952', 'num_games_owned': 35, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1693673857}
review:
Worms Clan Wars ist für mich ein nostalgisches und unterhaltsames Strategiespiel, das die charmante und chaotische Welt der Worms-Franchise auf eine neue Ebene hebt. Als Fan der Worms-Spiele seit meiner Kindheit hat mich dieses Spiel von Anfang an fasziniert.

Die einzigartige Mischung aus rundenbasiertem Gameplay und humorvollen Waffen ist in Worms Clan Wars weiterhin hervorragend umgesetzt. Die Möglichkeit, ein Team von Würmern zu befehligen und gegen Freunde oder KI-gesteuerte Gegner anzutreten, sorgt für stundenlangen Spielspaß.

Die Vielzahl der Waffen und Gadgets in Worms Clan Wars ist beeindruckend und sorgt für abwechslungsreiche taktische Herausforderungen. Vom klassischen Bazooka-Schuss bis hin zu absurden Waffen wie der heiligen Handgranate gibt es immer etwas Neues zu entdecken.

Der Mehrspielermodus ist ein Höhepunkt des Spiels, da er die Möglichkeit bietet, sich mit Freunden in hitzigen Schlachten zu messen. Die Kombination aus Teamarbeit und gegnerischen Listigkeiten macht die Matches besonders spannend.

Die Möglichkeit, eigene Wurm-Teams anzupassen und individuelle Würmer zu erstellen, trägt zur Personalisierung des Spielerlebnisses bei.

Es ist jedoch zu beachten, dass Worms Clan Wars, wie viele Worms-Spiele, eine gewisse Lernkurve hat, und das Beherrschen der verschiedenen Waffen und Techniken kann einige Zeit in Anspruch nehmen.

Zusammengefasst ist Worms Clan Wars für mich ein lustiges und unterhaltsames Strategiespiel, das den traditionellen Charme der Worms-Franchise bewahrt und gleichzeitig neue Möglichkeiten für kreative Kämpfe bietet. Es ist ideal, um mit Freunden zu spielen und gemeinsam Lacher zu ernten, während man versucht, die Würmer des Gegners zu besiegen. Worms Clan Wars hat definitiv einen festen Platz in meiner Sammlung von Multiplayer-Spielen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274646274', 'num_games_owned': 67, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 990, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 990, 'last_played': 1584823088}
review:
🐛 Worms Clan Wars to gra z gatunku strategicznych platformówek z elementami zręcznościowymi. A w skrócie totalna destrukcja z udziałem śmiesznych robali.
  
🐛 Grafika. Coś w stylu 2.5 D ze względu na perspektywę oraz wielowymiarowe modele, daje ona fajne poczucie głębi, kolory są nieco przygaszone co akurat na duży minus. Nie jest to najgorsza oprawa wizualna, ma swój urok, lecz nie przypadła mi do gustu. 

🐛 Audio. Całkiem dobre. Pasuje do klimatu gry. W opcjach możemy nawet wybrać pakiet dźwiękowy dla naszych postaci. 

🐛 Otoczenie. Jest dosyć różnorodne, wybór mapek jest ograniczony, ale jednak wystarczający. Występują mapki otwarte i zamknięte. 

🐛 Fizyka. Nasi bohaterowie są dość ciężcy do opanowania. Dosłownie ...ważą chyba z tonę. Skakanie jest nie wygodne, aczkolwiek model poruszania postaci przypadł mi do gustu, wygląda całkiem nieźle. Od takie małe skaczące niezdarnie glutki. Powierzchnie stałe, gazy jak i ciecze pod wpływem interakcji zachowują się dość realistycznie i spektakularnie. Szczególnie zabawny jest rozbryzg wody. 

🐛 Interfejs. Jest 2D. Zawiera sporo niestandardowych opcji jak np: możliwości edytowania naszej drużyny robaków. Jest animowany i posiada dźwięki, gdy go używamy. Obrazek w menu nie jest do końca czytelny, co jest akurat minusem. 

🐛 Fabuła jest, co by nie mówić na pewno oryginalna. Opowiada o szalonym hipnotyzerze, który zawładnął robakami znajdującymi się w muzeum. Przez co panuje tam totalny chaos. Tylko my mamy możliwość uratowania tego miejsca. W tym celu musimy przejść przez około 20 różnych poziomów wymiatając po drodze wszystkie robaki, by odnaleźć mityczną marchewkę oraz złotego robala. Poza misjami fabularnymi istnieją również misje specjalne.

🐛 Rozgrywka. Polega na wykonywaniu na zmianę z przeciwnikiem ruchów naszym robakiem/robakami. Wybór broni oraz narzędzi ułatwiających nam rozgrywkę jest zadowalający. Mamy możliwość grania online, grania z jednego urządzenia lub samemu. Dostępna jest także opcja założenia swojego własnego klanu i toczenia zażartych pojedynków z wrogimi klanami. Podczas gry parę razy natknęłam się na irytujący błąd. Zdarzyło się to w trybie multiplayer - bez powodu wywalało grę, jednak poza tym nie zauważyłam żadnych innych problemów.

🐛 Cena. Moim zdaniem jest trochę za wysoka. W sezonowych przecenach wychodzi jednak bardzo korzystnie.


🐛 Podsumowując jest to zabawna gierka, w której można miło spędzić czas na wzajemnej rozwałce z ekipką. Ewentualnie samemu zmierzyć się z ciekawymi misjami. Nie jest to jednak na tyle wciągająca gra by spędzić w niej mnóstwo godzin. Jest raczej miłym przerywnikiem podczas dłuższych sesji spędzonej w innej grze.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098975172', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 246, 'playtime_forever': 1076, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1076, 'last_played': 1475343616}
review:
A proper blast to play with a bunch of friends. It may be a bit of an older game, but for the price you can get it, especially when on sale, it is the best value for money out of the entire Worms franchise.

There are a bunch of customisation options, maps and weapons that are sure to keep things interesting for quite a while.

author: {'steamid': '76561198218960219', 'num_games_owned': 300, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 1191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1191, 'last_played': 1682752566}
review:
Worms Clan Wars kann sich in der Reihe der Worms-Spiele behaupten.

Die Singleplayer-Missionen sind angenehm abwechslungsreich und haben Checkpoints, was einen stundenlangen Grind verhindert.
Ansonsten ist das Spiel wie jedes andere Worms Spiel solide im Multiplayer und im Versus.

Der Clanwarsaspekt kann nicht gewertet werden, da wie bei vielen älteren Spielen der Multiplayer und damit das Ranked-System ausstirbt. Dies ist auch hier der Fall.

Die Sprecherin ist absolut fantastisch!



[b]Story:[/b] 7/10
[b]Spielmechanik:[/b] 7/10
[b]Atmosphäre:[/b] 6/10
[b]Grafik:[/b] 4/10
[b]Errungenschaften[/b]: 7/10

[b][i]Gesamtwertung:[/i][/b] 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198258467884', 'num_games_owned': 399, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 862, 'last_played': 1676910330}
review:
Honestly don't think this is worth buying. It seems to just be an improved version of Revolution but if you already own that (and you might if you picked up Worms Revolution Gold Edition from that one GOG free giveaway recently) then there's no point in picking this up as the changes aren't drastic enough.

 Besides, this seems to have an even lower player count on Steam than most of the other Worms games so it's not going to be a good option for online.
 I'd recommend getting Worms WMD or Worms Armageddon for that instead instead.

I also wouldn't really recommend getting this for the campaign, it's pretty dry, as is the case for the Worms games.

From my personal experience, I'm not a big fan of some of the changes this one has (plenty were carried over from Revolution tbf) as it deviates from what I am used to out of the Worms games. The ninja rope in particular was a point of frustration for me, it was very easy to get stuck on walls when using the stupid thing due to its' wonky physics.

You might get some fun out of this if you and your friends happen to all own this game for some reason, or you want to do a local game when some people are over. Otherwise, look at the other Worms games.

review:
This game looks fun, and my friends have enjoyed it in the past, so I thought I'd get it and join...

It is visually hellish. Some menus are fine, some are literally un-seeable. The screen is covered varying shades of pink a lot of the time, and while trying to find something that would fix it, it blue screened my PC.

Cannot recommend. Seems like it could be fun but I cannot recommend a product that doesn't function.

author: {'steamid': '76561199124112606', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1677267616}
review:
Opino que es un juego genial para jugar con amigos. Me ha traído muchos recuerdos de cuando jugaba la versión clásica en aquella época que ni si quiera iba al instituto (nacido en 1989). Lo bueno es que trae la misma esencia, es el mismo juego para jugar cooperativamente pero con los gráficos mejorados. Además, en workshop hay muchísimas cosas por descargar que lo mejoran (hasta voces de chiquito de la calzada) y eso  lo hace mucho más divertido. 
En contra tengo que decir que si no coges a tiempo una ofertaza del 90 %, no creo que os valga la pena.. Para echar un rato solo en modo historia o con mini retos, está entretenido, pero lo que siempre me ha gustado más de este juego es el jugar contra otros amigos. En el modo online tampoco hay nunca conectado hoy en día.. Me falta probar el remote play together a ver qué tal funciona.
En definitiva, muy recomendado por la nostalgia y para echar un rato con los amigos en casa (¡si tienen tiempo y paciencia en aprender movimientos + armas!) y sobretodo si hay una oferta muy buena. Los 25 € aprox. que tiene normalmente, no vale para nada la pena y menos si nunca puedes jugar online con otros clanes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125260692', 'num_games_owned': 254, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1671310447}
review:
Régebben szerettem a worms játékokat, de ez….

Minimum grafikán is szaggat, miért? Semmi sem indokolja egy ilyen kaliberű játéknál.
Az CPU ellenfelek vagy nagyon hülyék vagy nagyon tudnak, nincs a kettő között. Olyan pontosan lőnek, azt tanítani kellene!
Az irányítás, legyen elég annyi, hogy nem esik kézre.
Én bevallom a Miner Problems pályán feladtam, az egész kampányra jellemző, hogy annyira le van korlátozva a lőszer és/vagy fegyver készleted, hogy így nem ”fun” játszani.
A multi halott, de az nem is érdekelt.

Aki szeret local-ban játszani annak tudom csak ajánlani.

author: {'steamid': '76561198196818634', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1545050119}
review: I am a 40 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 13 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So I decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

review:

Leider sind die Online Server komplett tot und die KI sehr schlecht. Mir Freunden am gleichen PC oder in der gleichen Lobby super spaßig. Die Kampagne habe ich nicht gespielt, weil ich dazu bisher keinen Anreiz zu hatte. Deshalb kann ich dazu noch nichts sagen.

Empfehlung ist raus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034193742', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1663683810}
review:
Специфічний стиль. Подекуди, складно відрізнити контур мапи від фону. Це мінус.

Натомість, багато цікавих механік, які відсутні в більшості інших частин:
Рідина, якою можна затоплювати (хробак перебуває в ній, втрачаючи n-кількість HP за хід).
Різні за статурою хробаки - безпосередньо вливає на геймплей. Легший хробак швидше рухається, але його легше скинути тощо.
Рухомі елементи на мапах.
Достатньо сильний штучний інтелект (порівняно із W.M.D.)

Частина специфічна, але позитивних моментів, все ж, більше. По знижці це easy buy

author: {'steamid': '76561198193918619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1449, 'last_played': 1698058356}
review: I am a 50 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just, watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. loaded into the game, made my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. loved it as it was the best time had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories

author: {'steamid': '76561198120530775', 'num_games_owned': 3369, 'num_reviews': 338, 'playtime_forever': 1998, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1998, 'last_played': 1663688580}
review:
Good one. This is a physics/strategy game. The graphics are nice. The music is OK. The story is simple but funny. 

No bugs or crashes. Runs fine on win 7.

Overall, it is very entertaining. Worms games are always hilarious. The story is silly in a good way and links a relatively long campaign. Some levels are head-scratchers but almost all are pretty casual. Plenty of weapons and tactics to try out. It includes cards and also achievements, but some require PVP or Multiplayer so getting all of them could be tricky. This is one of those games that can be a great choice for the whole family. If you like comedy and suicidal/murderous worms with an attitude, this should be a pleasant gaming experience.

review:
Cel mai bun joc Worms de pe piata. Ce a venit in urma are grafica mai slaba. Ce a venit dupa a introdus elemente noi ce deviaza de la reteta originala Worms de exemplu vehicule si miscare in timp real.

Multiplayer-ul inca functioneaza. Daca vrei Worms 3D joaca Worms Ultimate Mayhem din 2011. Daca vrei Worms 2D joaca Wroms Clan Wars din 2013. Sunt cele mai bune jocuri worms pe care ai putea sa le gasesti.

A, si are si workshop.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067389025', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 2135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1632, 'last_played': 1664916961}
review:
Multiplayer: Worms Clan Wars ist für mich vom Gameplay gesehen das beste Worms das ich kenne! Das freie Spiel macht richtig Laune und die Möglichkeiten alle Optionen anzupassen, geben dem Spieler wirklich Freiraum für Variation. Zusammen mit Freunden ist es wirklich ein Fest. Super Spiel und ohne die Kampagne würde es von mir auch eine 10 von 10 bekommen.

Singleplayer: Tara (die Erzählerin der Story) ist wirklich lustig und quasi das einzig wirklich Positive an der Story meiner Meinung nach, denn: Welcher Autist hat sich diese Kampagne ausgedacht? Mein Gott war das ein Herumgewuppe mit der Steuerung und ich wollte noch nie so sehr mein Lineal zum Abmessen der Flugbahnen herausholen, wie in dieser Kampagne. Manche Level sind einfach nur da um den Spieler maßlos abzufucken (weil irgend so eine jump-and-run-Parkour-Scheiße UNBEDINGT im Spiel sein muss). Außerdem musst du manche Level JA GENAUSO IN DER REIHENFOLGE DURCHSPIELEN wie es sich die Entwickler vorgestellt haben (also wenn du das Level doch schaffst, aber die Reihenfolge nicht einhältst, triggert die Cutscene nicht.). Das musste wirklich nicht sein in 1-2 Level. Gegen Ende gingen ein paar Level wieder ganz in Ordnung.

Aber auch hier gibt es wieder eine Ausnahme: (folglich Spoiler zum letzten Level) - [spoiler] Der Endbossfight gegen Mesmer könnte fast nicht langweiliger sein, dennoch zieht er sich (wie quasi jedes Level in der zweiten Hälfte der Story). Also verkackst du irgendwo und stirbst, nur um alles wieder von vorne zu machen oder du kommst relativ ez durch bis du einem wehrlosen Wurm gegenübetrittst, der noch weniger Reaktionen zeigt als der Endboss von Demon Souls. Du musst ihn dann einfach nur ein paar mal abschießen und das wars dann. Ganz ehrlich, alles davor war deutlich schwieriger und rundet die ganze Shitshow eigentlich nur noch richtig ab. [/spoiler]

Also lasst die Kampagne am besten links liegen. Der freie Modus ist das wovon Worms Clan Wars lebt, und das ist auch gut so. 9 von 10 Punkte

author: {'steamid': '76561198297682072', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 2829, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2829, 'last_played': 1562517045}
review: Jedna z najlepszych części serii. Ma najlepszy styl graficzny, można nieźle się ubawić przy tak zaawansowanej fizyce, której gra tak potrzebowała. Za to poziom trudności kampanii jest dość nierówny, ale znośny. Prawdziwe wyzwanie może sprawić jedynie ostatnia mapa. Gra też ma problem zbugowanego multiplayera, który potrafi być dosyć niestabilny. Ponadto różnorodność robaków wprowadza urozmaicenia do gry. Różne elementy w postaci ruchomych przeszkód także sa ogromnym plusem. Bardzo dużą robotę zrobiła też społeczność, która wprowadziła dla teamów bardzo dużą możliwość wszelkich customizacji i jest to najlepszy workshop, z jakim spotkałem się do tej pory na całym Steamie, spędzając przy doboru języka, czy innych rzeczy grube godziny, żeby odnaleźć w końcu to, czego na pewno chcę. Dużo elementów zostalo po prostu wykonane tak dobrze. Jako gra imprezowa, czy jako gierka singlowa mająca na celu przejście kampanii, czy nawet  zagranie od czasu do czasu z przyjaciółmi online to będzie wyśmienity tytuł. Szczerze polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077153956', 'num_games_owned': 4278, 'num_reviews': 472, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1647855167}
review: Перезапуск серии Worms в 2006 привел к настоящему безумию. Team17 в общем-то никогда не стеснялась доить свою самую ценную корову, но после рестарта новые игры стали выходить буквально каждый год. В принципе в этом не было бы ничего плохого если не бы не страдало общее качество, а разработчики больше бы экспериментировали. Clan Wars пострадал от излишней идентичности с Revolutions и полным игнором девелоперов на имеющиеся баги. Патчи убирали мелкие проблемы, но скорее были направлены на добавление предметов для кастомизации. В планах Team17 был вывод червяков на кибер арену, но и тут вышел провал. Клановые войны не оправдали ожиданий, так как большинство придуманных карт отличались скромными размерами, что лишало игру размаха и снижало градус фирменного безумия. В итоге приходилось концентрировать внимание на одиночной кампании (что для серии странно), ведь в ней были действительно большие и интересные карты, правда порой цели миссий придумывал явно какой-то неадекват. В общем ставлю 7.0 и рекомендую только тем, кто каким-то образом пропустил более сбалансированную Revolutions и то исключительно для ознакомления.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158721869', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1707761157}
review:
To be brief, as a veteran of the franchise, Clan Wars feels stiff and frustrating to play when held next to other titles.
On its own merits, it's not *too* bad, but it does things worse than other games in the series without much to make up for it. This makes it hard to recommend, aside for if you're interested in exploring the franchise's history.
If you're just looking for a 2D Worms experience, Armageddon and WMD are here to fill that need much better.

-

Now for the less brief, why I think it falls short of other titles:

The most important aspect of an artillery game like Worms is simple: the readability, the physics and the precision. Clan Wars feels lacking in these aspects, trying to move, to aim, to enact strategies... it all feels imprecise, and so the gameplay will often feel frustrating.

The physics and friction feel off, quite janky even. It's something hard to explain without playing and getting a feel for it, but the gist is that collisions feel unreliable.
The most egregious exemple is with the Ninja Rope, using it will very frequently result in getting randomly stuck to walls, ceilings, floors and PARTICULARLY corners, sometimes the rope will even hit itself over nothing. But in general, you'll find that Worms unreasonably stick to surfaces, walls especially, so you can't have fun using wall bounces in your strategies, which sucks.
There are plenty of small instances where the unreliable collisions will screw you. Like launching a grenade straight up next to a Worm, it goes just fine on the way up, but on the way down it will bounce off the Worm's head and away, despite it not obstructing the trajectory on the way up. Sometimes you'll blow up a Worm and launch it somewhere where you think it will bounce off/silde, only for it to safely land on a >80° surface just fine. Other times you're using the Super Sheep and the camera lagging behind makes you crash into a wall you didn't have the time to react to.
Where I'm getting at is that it end up being a "death by a thousand cuts" situation.

In my opinion, the game's 2.5D style tanks the precision.
The 3D of the terrain and lack of defined outlines really muddy the visibility of the shape of the landscape. I think this goes hand-in-hand with the janky collisions, it all feels flimsy and unreliable.
I'm also convinced that the 3D messes with the alignment of the crosshair, due to the visual distortion caused by being in a 3D perspective - aligning your shots feels pretty shoddy compared to other Worms games.
Basically, the addition of 3D does not do much besides diminishing the clarity and precision, and making the game needlessly more frustrating to play.

Speaking of gameplay, Clan Wars does offer its own gimmicks.
The terrain objects with physics and unique properties can certainly be fun to play with, and so are the water particles and items. They add new options in the gameplay and some new layer of strategy..
Outside of that, Worm classes might force in some strategy elements, but they really just get in the way more than anything else ("Wait, how much damage does this weapon do with this class?", "What? I really wasn't expecting the knockback to be like that with this guy!").
They make the game less flexible and meets you with new frequent problems you wish you didn't have to deal with.

As a last aside, I'm going to gloss over the weirdness with the game's engine, as I personally don't really understand it. But I do want to point it out to say that whatever is going on with the framerate doesn't help the feeling of stiffness/choppiness the game has. I've also encountered a handful of crashes.


All in all, the bottom line is that Worms Clan Wars feels worse to play than many other games in the franchise, and what unique things it has don't make it worth coming back to.
Ignore it and move along. Again, if you want to play a 2D Worms, get either Armageddon or WMD.

review:
[h1] Worms Clan Wars [/h1]
Nie ma co się rozpisywać nad robaczkami, bo nie ma po co. 
Gra polega na zabijaniu pamperków.
Najlepsze wormsy jakie mam w bibliotece, a mam aktualnie jedynie Worms Clan Wars także nie mam do czego porównać. Polecam jeśli ma się z kim grać, natomiast jeśli nie ma się z kim to nie ma sensu kupować.

review: This isn't my favorite Worms experience, but definitely a fun time if you love the series. Water is still pretty interesting and the classes have gotten some significant balance and strategy changes. I enjoyed the new stuff, but at the end of the relatively short single player campaign I didn't feel there was anything more to do. This is still a good Worms game, so try it.

review: Playing was unbelievably nostalgic. I loved playing this game on my Nintendo DS lite as a child and enjoy it just as much now as an adult. Playing this game with friends is a joy. It never get boring with the abundance of interesting weapons and equipment at your disposal. Even with nuclear weapons and meteor strikes, nothing beats getting that perfectly placed grenade shot which blows your opponent off the map.

author: {'steamid': '76561198308518676', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 3258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3245, 'last_played': 1669996826}
review:
El Worms de siempre pero con gráficos nuevos.

¡A matar gusanos!

[h1][u]PROS[/u][/h1]

Muy buena mejora en los gráficos. Son casi 3D durante el juego sin llegar a serlo.

La música no podía fallar tampoco así como las frases de los gusanos.

La física es muy buena. Minas que rebotan, agua que fluye, llamas de fuego...

En el menú tienes un amplísimo manual de Cómo se juega en el submenú Ayuda y Opciones.
De todas formas lo irás aprendiendo durante el juego en modo historia.

Posibilidad de jugar en Local (Historia, competitivo para hacer un mapa o contra la máquina) o Multijugador.

[h1][u]CONTRAS[/u][/h1]

Ninguno en particular salvo que en Linux se queda congelada la pantalla de carga tras pasarte un nivel (o querer reintentarlo).

[h1][u]CONCLUSIÓN[/u][/h1]

Muy buen juego para reirte un rato con los amigos mientras os tirais bazocazos o cualquier otra arma.

La compra recomendada con rebaja.

Así que lo marcaré con el pulgar hacia arriba.

[h1][u]RECOMENDACIONES[/u][/h1]

Como siempre, recomiendo ir haciendo copias entre sesiones de juego del directorio de saves.

[u]Linux[/u]
<Steam-folder>/userdata/<SteamID>/233840

[u]Windows[/u]
<Steam-folder>/userdata/<SteamID>/233840

review:
This game is hilariously fun with friends, You will see this game almost every steam sale there is.

Fun little platformer vs AI/friends that can be enjoyed through the ages.

Not much else can be said about this  title, this would be ideal for being played only with other Real players with or against AI.

Bottom Line: Wait for a sale and get this or any of the other Worms titles!

review: The whole clan stuff is not for me, as I'm not much of an online gamer, but the story mode is enjoyable, and humorous. The presentation is similar looking to Worms Revolution, which is to say it looks nice, if not taxing on the graphical prowess. It also features the class mechanic from Worms Revolution, which I still don't fully understand how the classes change anything up in the game-play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043331393', 'num_games_owned': 211, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1363, 'last_played': 1605772708}
review: I got this because worms reminds me of pocket tanks. I did not realize this game was more complicated than that. The game is challenging in various ways from discovering the fastest way to do things to the safest way to navigate a puzzle. Eventually get to a point where everything had to be almost perfect and found myself resetting often. While this is frustrating at times I never felt cheated because the AI will usually repeat the same steps over and over allowing me to modify each run slightly differently.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052641086', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1338, 'last_played': 1688253372}
review:
I have bought WCW to play with a friend that owns it, too. I have 70+ hours on worms revolutions, and - well, it's the same game, with a few tweaks here and there. Also, it's still buggy, worms can get caught in a perpetual motion washing mashine. They removed the jingle that used to play when your hit someone off the map with a baseball bat. The campaign was kinda fun, but short.  
All in all, pick it up if you have a friend and you can get it or the key on a budget. I got it for 3 bucks, so i can't really complain. But I do anyway. Customisation menu for weapons and settings sucks monkeyballs, too.   
The more i think about it, the more i want to play Revolutions instead.

review: It's a Worms game where you're shooting bazooka's, shotguns, and sheep at other worms to defeat them. Nothing new here and nothing wrong with that. Graphics and sounds aren't breath-taking, but you're not here for that. Just be aware that if you play the single-player campaign, be prepared for impossible AI shots and missions of complete frustration mixed with missions of complete fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198300792282', 'num_games_owned': 77, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1027, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 376, 'last_played': 1641299180}
review:
Не пожалейте купить по скидке данную замечательную игру. Worms Clan Wars полон веселых моментов, рандома и ностальгии. Замечательная пошаговая стратегия для игры с друзьями, коих в наше время становится все меньше и меньше, а сама серия игр про червяков - постепенно умирает. Купил игру один, а друзья противятся? Не беда - тут есть поддержка функции Remote Play. Запускаешь игру, приглашаешь друга через стим поиграть в worms через remote play и все. Вы спокойно играете в 2 на 1 компьютере в червяков.
Надеюсь серия игр Worms, еще порадует нас качественной новой частью!

review: Le principal intêret du jeu est le multijoueur online. Or, celui-ci est désert. L'idée de faire une équipe avec worms tank,scientifique, agilité et normal) est bonne mais elle est trop sous exploité à mon goût (car cela se ressent juste dans leur déplacement et quand ils meurent). L'optimisation n'est pas terrible, on a des chutes de FPS même sur de bons PC. Pour tout cela, mais surtout parce que ce worms est trop orienté multijoueur online. Je ne peux pas le recommander.

author: {'steamid': '76561198993898609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1324, 'last_played': 1597494919}
review:
Short: Nostalgic wars.

In Detail: Well when this game was new, it had several improvements, nice gameplay and relative OK campaign to go along with it (challenges are not very interesting to be honest). For it's time, it was game to be recommended and played for all who like this type of game.

From this perspective, it didn't age that good, graphics are really not ageing well and design that goes with it, doesn't improve experience. Movement and mechanics of the game are also not very well but it is playable and for all people who are curios about this game but never played it before, I really don't recommend (this is the reason for my suggestion) it since it doesn't have too much to offer to new people, I would recommend some new version of this game to start with it. 

On the other hand if you want to play it, voice acting and humor is really good. if you have few friends to play with them it can be enjoyable. Weapons and gadgets are versatile which will make each game more interesting in the retrospective. For all the editors there, there is rather fine level editor which can make thing better if you wish to play with it.

So in conclusion, if you are new to this type of game or Worms franchise in general, try some never game but for all who want to join nostalgic wagon, hop on and join the ride (although again i would recommend some sale).

author: {'steamid': '76561197997740965', 'num_games_owned': 7957, 'num_reviews': 2015, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1515877202}
review:
[h1] Не нужно было целовать кота. [/h1]

[code] Берешь одну из своих лучших игр, добавляешь в нее чайную ложку новых возможностей, доводишь до идеальной густоты и дело в шляпе! [/code]

Доброго времени суток, сегодня на улице дождик, так что на поверхность вылезла целая орава кровожадных червей, готовых поубивать друг друга ради....чего?

Worms Clan Wars сумела громко выстрелить на момент своего выхода, а все благодаря откровенному сходству с Worms Revolution, которая в свою очередь была одной из лучших частей в серии, уступая только божественной worms world party, а вот в последнюю я наяриваю каждое лето против ботов, запуская свою старенькую sony playstation 1.

Сейчас Worms Clan Wars не является самой свежей версией червивой линейки, но если вы имеете желание поиграть против товарищей, то я советовал бы именно данную часть.
Worms Clan Wars содержит в себе очень приятное количество разнообразного оружия, удачную физику полета червей и снарядов, что на мой взгляд очень важно в подобного рода играх! В Worms Clan Wars все еще сочная и достойная графика, позволяющая ласкать глаза от происходящей бойни, ну и конечно же великолепная камера, которая всегда покажет самые точные ракурсы, а при желании и всю карту. Долой богомерзкие углы, закрывающие всю вечеринку, даешь народу свободный обзор!

Некоторое время назад Team17 Digital придумала делить червей по физическим способностям. Можно встретить толстяков, обычных трудяг и умников, которые были добавлены в прошлых играх, а в Worms Clan Wars чутка видоизменили свои характеристики, доведя баланс боя до совершенства.

Мы с товарищами играли исключительно дружеские матчи, что на этом аккаунте, что на других, оставив одиночный режим на обозримое будущее, но оно так и не наступило. По поводу одиночного режима я совершенно ничего не смогу вам рассказать, но одиночная игра есть, точно есть, так что можете смело держать этот факт в своей голове.

Серия игр Worms всегда славилась пошаговыми боями, посему и данная игра никак не обошла стороной традиции. У каждой команды есть группа червей, побеждает тот человек, который остался с живым бойцом, ну а остальные проигрывают. Игроки ходят поочередно, уничтожая сходу, либо же забирая внушительную часть здоровья у противников. Все это происходит под залп таймера, но его чаще всего хватает для удачного хода, а если нет, то отправляйтесь в червивый рай, вас точно ничего не спасет.

Онлайн баталии можно сразу же отбрасывать в чулан. Людей на просторах серверов практически нет, да и не было долгое время. Если будете брать игру, то исключительно под себя и друзей, иначе нет никакого смысла.

В Worms Clan Wars можно разодеть своих червей не хуже дорогостоящих моделей. Если вшитого контента окажется слишком мало, то следует посетить мастерскую в центре сообщества, там уже лежат многообещающие наряды.

Worms Clan Wars изначально имела возможность воевать целыми кланами, но по понятным причинам, друзья, данная затея провалилась спустя годы после выхода игры. Для этого нужен крепкий онлайн, а его нет, увы и ах.

На скидках игру отдают за относительные копейки. Если в вашей берлоге лежит геймпад, а в запасе есть хоть 1 друг, то игра точно скрасит вам пару вечеров. Если же таких нет, то попробуйте после своего хода закинуть геймпад под кровать, скорее всего ваш монстроподобный сосед не устоит перед червивым геноцидом. Приятной игры!

Хочу поблагодарить всех за отдачу и лайки, берегите нервы и избегайте шлака в магазине.
Если понравился обзор, то приглашаю оценить и остальные: https://steamcommunity.com/id/rrombik/recommended/

author: {'steamid': '76561198174653382', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1527386707}
review:
Un día "navegando" por una de esas páginas que venden claves de productos de Steam, me topé con una oferta de un Worms, que no era otro que este "Clan Wars". Si bien no lo conocía, el precio económico sumado al recuerdo de los Worms que jugué en mi adolescencia (World Party y Armageddon) hicieron que no dudara mucho en hacer "clic" en la mencionada oferta. Aún no llego a haber jugado dos horas al juego, pero son suficientes para decir: NO RECOMIENDO.
Si bien el juego mantiene el humor y la mecánica de los clásicos, la parte gráfica es espantosamente tosca e incomoda. Apuntaron por unos gráficos nuevos que solo entorpecen. No entiendo por que cambiar lo que funciona tan bien, al menos en este tipo de juego no me parecen necesarios los gráficos en 3d, con 2d es más que suficiente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126167704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2138, 'last_played': 1672012168}
review:
Das Spiel macht extrem viel Spaß und ist sehr abwechslungsreich. Die Grafik ist zwar nicht atemberaubend aber durchaus ausreichend und die Bugs, die definitiv vorhanden sind, machen das Spiel noch lustiger als es ohnehin schon ist.
Wenn man Leute kennt, die mit einem Spielen kann ich nur zum Kauf raten, wenn man allerdings alleine Spielen und online nach Gegners suchen möchte, würde ich abraten das Spiel zu kaufen, da fast niemand online nach Mitspielern sucht.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965215862', 'num_games_owned': 4209, 'num_reviews': 522, 'playtime_forever': 957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 957, 'last_played': 1503087429}
review:
[h1]🎮 [u]Worms Clan Wars[/u] 🎮 [/h1] 

Der Klassiker vom Spielprinzip in der Worms-Spielereihe, entwickelt und publiziert von [url=https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/Team17?snr=1_5_9__2000]Team 17 DIgital Ltd[/url]. Eine verbesserte und überarbeitete Version des Vorgängers "[i]Worms: Revolution[/i]".

[b]Gameplay[/b] 

Wir steuern unseren Trupp von Würmern und müssen auf einer Art Reise verschiedene Level meistern. Dabei gilt es die K.I. zu besiegen, indem man allerlei Waffen aus seinem Arsenal verwendet und die feindlichen Würmer so tötet, durch Zerstörung der Welt dafür sorgt, dass diese ein ähnliches Schicksal erleiden oder sie schlicht in die Leere fallen. So wie man es kennt und liebt!

Dabei erfolgt die Steuerung über Maus und Tastatur und damit das Ganze nicht zu leicht ist, gibt es natürlich auch einen Timer. Es gilt schnell, präzise und tödlich zu sein. Spaßiger ist das Spiel natürlich gegen menschliche Spieler im lokalen oder online Multiplayer. Für das Erfüllen der Story gibt es allerdings auch einfach zu verdienende Errungenschaften und zum Lernen des Spiels, damit man gegen erfahrenere Spieler nicht gänzlich baden geht, durchaus zu gebrauchen.

[b]Grafik & Sound[/b] 

Die Grafik ist selbstverständlich im Comic-Stil und durch die runden Darstellungen sehr knuddelig/knuffig. Das ist aber schon seit jeher der Charme der Spielereihe und es wirkt auch irgendwie "süß", wenn die kleinen Würmer sterben und ihr Grabstein erscheint. Die Hintergrundbilder sind in Ordnung, die Zerstörung der Welt und die Animationen stimmig. Akustisch sind die kurzen, aber prägnanten Äußerungen der Würmer belustigend. Ansonsten ist die Hintergrundmusik recht dezent; man beschränkt sich aufs Wesentliche. Die Animationssounds sind passend zu dem was grafisch passiert: Keine Beanstandung!

[b]Fazit[/b] 

Oldie but goldie könnte man zu diesem Titel durchaus sagen. Im Sale für unter fünf Euro auch kein Titel der noch Unsummen kostet. Besonders empfehlenswert natürlich, wenn man das Spiel gemeinsam mit Freunden spielen kann. Deshalb gibt es hier auch ein Viererpack zu kaufen. Dann potenziert sich das Vergnügen exponentiell und es rentiert sich noch mehr. Kaufempfehlung meinerseits zu rabattierten Konditionen!

[i]Wenn ihr an weiteren Reviews von mir interessiert seid oder meine Arbeit unterstützen wollt, dann folgt meiner [url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/GermanReviewGroup]Gruppe[/url] und/oder der [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/32139821/]Kuration[/url][/i].

author: {'steamid': '76561197995205126', 'num_games_owned': 631, 'num_reviews': 738, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1584282744}
review:
[b]Worms Clan Wars[/b] to ciekawy tytuł, prezentujący klasyczny, już dobrze znany fanom serii gier worms schemat walki między robakami, tym razem mocno nastawiony na rozgrywki klanowe (online), gry rankingowe. Dodatkowo wróciła grafika 3D, która prezentuje się dziwacznie, co jest odczuwalne w rozgrywce – więc całościowo gra robi mieszane uczucia.

[h1]Ale do rzeczy:[/h1]

Tak jak już wspomniałem powyżej mamy do czynienia z klasyczna grą worms, gdzie toczymy bój między konkurującymi ze sobą drużynami robaków. Wygra ta drużyna, która wyeliminuje wszystkie robaki przeciwnej drużyny – tu nic się nie zmieniło.

Aby tego dokonać musimy korzystać z dostępnego nam sprzętu, jak również zbierać skrzyneczki które będą dodawać nam zabójczy asortyment, leczyć nas na polu walki – ponownie tu również się nic nie zmieniło.

Natomiast to co uległo zmianie to samo nastawienie i ukierunkowanie gry, pod rozgrywki klanowe, w których gracze mogliby się łączyć i walczyć z innymi robaczkowymi klanami o dominacje w rankingu – tak, gra jest mocno nastawiona pod tym względem, jak również pod pryzmatem społecznościowym. Co nie jest złym posunięciem, jeżeli grupa grających ma większe wymagania co do samej rozgrywki, szukając większych wrażeń oraz wyzwań - a sama kampania, lub tryb potyczek ze znajomymi, mu nie wystarcza.

Kolejną rzeczą na którą trzeba zwrócić uwagę to oprawa graficzna, która budzi mieszane uczucia – ponownie producent gry postanowił wrócić do 3D, co moim zdaniem nie wyszło na dobrze. Grafika jest słabej jakości, destrukcja otoczenia jest dziwaczna i mało precyzyjna – błędów w tej grze nie unikniemy. Złudzenia wizualne powodowane błędem grafiki również.

Twórca zaimplementował zaawansowany silnik fizyki, który daje możliwość takim jak woda na swobodne przemieszczanie się, zalewanie lokalizacji do których będzie miała dostęp – to również dotyczy innych obiektów na mapie. Można poprzez nasze działania wykorzystać je do walki z przeciwnikiem – co jest ciekawym rozwiązaniem.

Co ciekawe, robaki zostali podzieleni na klasy, każda z tych klas posiada inne wewnętrzne statystyki – robak „mózgowiec” jest szybki i zwinny lecz ma mało życia, z czego robak „czołg”, ma dużo życia lecz jest strasznie powolny. Od nas samych będzie zależeć jak wykorzystany każdego z robaka, jaką strategie obierzemy w walce.

[h1]Podsumowanie:[/h1]

Worms Clan Wars to ciekawy tytuł, prezentująca klasyczną rozgrywkę jaką znamy z innych części worms, lecz tym razem większy nacisk jest skierowany na rozgrywki klanowe (online).

Mnie niestety powyższy tytuł nie urzekł, wolę klasyczna dobra rozgrywkę niż starcia klanowe, w {moim zdaniem)	lepszych odsłonach gry o robakach jak: Worms Reloaded czy nowszego Worms W.M.D – ale to tylko moje zdanie.


[quote][b]Szukasz więcej recenzji?[/b] Zapraszam.
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/32785706/ ]Kurator walas85[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198078781228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1325, 'last_played': 1644419181}
review:
It is a fun game, filled with nostalgia from the first worm game i played in the 90s
now, is it worth it?
really fun to play with friends, but at this point in time, the game has gotten old and not many like playing it. multiplayer achievements are technically impossible.
if your friends have this game too and are interested, then give it a go. otherwise you'll be stuck with the local play with AI being your only enemy...
also, surprisingly, less than 2% of users have completed the story mode, which is curious to say the least

review:
《百战天虫:部落战争》非常棒非常欢乐的游戏~
游戏还有故事模式，虽然其实故事模式是熟悉各种武器之类的~
可惜有D版中文却找不到汉化补丁~可惜了~
不过毕竟这类游戏玩一局要好久~已经不适合现在这个浮躁的年代了~哈哈哈~

author: {'steamid': '76561198134427194', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 911, 'last_played': 1593663075}
review:
As a older Worms game this one has pretty much everything you expect.
AI that can make impossible shots : Yes
Completely wacky physics : Yes
AI using every second of timer : Yes
Super easy story that turns into the hardest game mankind has ever seen : Yes
All and all Worms is a really fun game but this one has no online presents anymore so completing the last few achievements is a joke.
I would rate this on par with Worms Revolution in terms of mechanics although Revolution is a superior game  in the way of replayability.


7 out of 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198126367972', 'num_games_owned': 1230, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 926, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 926, 'last_played': 1571533100}
review:
[h1]Stare [strike]nie takie dobre [/strike] robaczki. [/h1]
Każdy, kto za plecami ma trochę wiosen, na pewno kojarzy Wormsy - jak nie te, to inne.
Zabawy jak zawsze masa, ciekawy i humorystyczny tryb fabularny, który pozwala mieć w grze jakiś cel a nie tylko urządzać pojedynki, a do tego przeróżne wyzwania czy tryby multi.
O grze za wiele powiedzieć nie można, muzyczka jest właściwie tylko jakimś bardzo odległym dodatkiem, grafika trzyma swój specyficzny poziom, a sama rozgrywka jest chaotyczna tak jak zawsze - co jest bardzo dobre.
Z dodatkowych urozmaiceń, można również dopisać możliwość personalizacji własnej ekipy - ich wyglądu, "klas" a nawet głosów i tekstów (które bez problemu pobierzemy przez warsztat), dzięki czemu nasza gra stanie się jeszcze bardziej zabawna.
Pozytywnym urozmaiceniem są tutaj osiągnięcia steamowe, które zachęcają aby spędzić w Wormsach jeszcze trochę czasu, którego i tak poświęca się sporo - w moim przypadku jakieś 15H i to głównie w trybie fabularnym; pojedynek zagrałem właściwie raz.
Jedynym minusem, jest tutaj nieuczciwa konkurencja w postaci gracza sterowanego przez komputer - wystrzały pocisków czy rzuty granatami są idealnie odmierzone, przez co momentami można się zniechęcić, gdy widzimy, że przeciwnik na 99% trafi i zada maksymalne obrażenia.
[B] Grę jak najbardziej polecam, jeśli nie dla fabuły, to na pewno dla wielu godzin dobrej zabawy z przyjaciółmi w pojedynkach. [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198173048166', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2043, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 493, 'last_played': 1577464750}
review:
Annoying but fun, challenging and addictive. You need to be very careful because you can easily screw thangs up. Kinda reminds me of Spelunky. It is very fun in multiplayer and you can customize your worms (for example: give them hilarious names). There are some puzzles and tricks in most of the levels, so you need to have a good strategy and have a lot of nerves. I like the narrator because of the dark humour and the story is nice. Overall, it's pretty cool game.

CONS: It crashes sometimes and there are no online matches available.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085367707', 'num_games_owned': 778, 'num_reviews': 368, 'playtime_forever': 943, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 917, 'last_played': 1597596484}
review:
Worms Clan Wars trás novamente elementos clássicos da franquia, como a jogabilidade em 2D e textos bem humorados, mas aposta pouco em novidades, com quase nenhuma adição em relação ao Revolution.

Os gráficos renovados e os cenários agora não são mais estáticos como nós títulos anteriores, possuindo plataformas e diversos outros mecanismos que se movem, dando um maior dinamismo às partidas.

No modo campanha, são 25 missões no total, com uma trama que diz respeito aos planos maléficos de uma minhoca que pretende roubar um artefato mágico nos museus de cada período para assim poder controlar todas as outras minhocas.

Desta forma, os cenários são divididos em cinco temáticas diferentes, sendo elas a Pré História, Viking, Indígena, Idade média e Industrial. Porém a história não tem seriedade alguma e serve, na verdade, como um pretexto para as batalhas acontecerem.

Além do modo de campanha, o jogo também trás missões do Worm Ops que são desafios mais curtos em que se deve concluir a fase de formas específicas, como por exemplo, usando determinada arma ou item.

O jogo trás muitas opções para mais de um jogador, seja local ou online, inclusive permitindo a criação de clãs, que funcionariam como um time fixo. No entanto, a comunidade online já viu dias melhores e se encontra atualmente vazia, não sendo nada fácil achar partidas.

Quem ficou de fora desta vez, apesar de já ter aparecido em outros lançamentos do passado, foi a dublagem brasileira, e certamente  vai deixar com saudades os jogadores já acostumados com as frases inusitadas tais como “Você não me escapa!”.

No geral, Clan Wars trás pequenas evoluções em relação ao seu antecessor, mas nada que seja realmente marcante ou relevante, de forma que está mais para uma versão definitiva do Revolution do que um novo jogo propriamente dito. É um título bastante divertido de qualquer maneira. BOM (7/10).

author: {'steamid': '76561197981772121', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1693416015}

author: {'steamid': '76561198048530621', 'num_games_owned': 276, 'num_reviews': 199, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1588456739}
review:
Worms Clan Wars ist ein rundenbasiertes Artillerie-Taktikspiel was mit Freunden unglaublich viel Spaß machen kann. Es gibt eine vielfältige Auswahl an Items und Maps. Für einige lustige Runden zwischendurch kann man das mal spielen! 

[b] Fazit: 7/10 [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198123006740', 'num_games_owned': 688, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1564846222}
review:
Un port a linux horrible, el rendimiento es completamente nefasto, tiene muchos bugs en el codigo porque muchas veces se congela el juego, tal como pensaba Team17 esta lleno de programadores inutiles.

La moraleja niños es que no hay que comprar juegos para linux de estudios que no dan un buen soporte, en todo caso si los veis en persona alguna vez podeis preguntarles como es posible que sean tan inutiles siendo su trabajo xD.

PD: no hagais como yo y les digais en la cara que una piedra programa mejor que ellos xD.

review:
boring worms game 
the missions are very similare 
now you have 4 differents worms : a small and fast, a big and slow, etc... 
not enought funny 
but it's a beautifull game that wich can be enjoy just with friends  

Worms clan wars est ennuyeux 
les missions sont trop identiques 
maintenant il y a 4 vers différents : un petit qui est rapide, un gros qui est lent etc... 
globalement le jeu n'est pas assez fun pour un "worms" 
néanmoins les graphiques sont beaux et le jeu est uniquement plaisant entre amis 

pas recommandable, très loin de Armageddon 
let's go to Worms Armageddon !

author: {'steamid': '76561198087498998', 'num_games_owned': 240, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1207, 'last_played': 1621737714}
review:
Ein Klassiker unter wenigen...
Immer ein Spaß deine Freunde zu Crushen nur um danach die Absolute Wut zu spüren...
Eines der wenigen Spiele das es Schaff 4 Ausgewachsene Männer in eine Emotionale Achterbahn zu schicken die nur Frauen im 9 Monat verspüren...
Sie sagen immer es sei das Schmerzhafteste ein Kind zu gebären sowas schlimmes könnt ihr nie erfahren, aber wurdet ihr schon mal mit dem Stubsfinger die Kleinste kante des Berges runter gestoßen nein also bitte Informiert euch erst bevor ihr sowas sagt ...danke

author: {'steamid': '76561198012708019', 'num_games_owned': 3057, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 3238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2974, 'last_played': 1638830434}
review:
Capitolo bellissimo di una grande saga storica!

Non sarà il migliore di tutta la saga, ma ha quel tocco di freschezza e di diverso che aggiunge parecchie variabili in più alla partita; la fisica dei liquidi offre spunti molto interessanti e la presenza delle soundbank (che mi sarebbe piaciuto veder riproposte anche in WMD) offre anche un tocco di ilarità in più al comparto sonoro.

10/10 would lanciare una banana usando un verme con la voce di Giorgio Mastrota again

(PS: Se avete degli amici con cui giocare, dopo un paio di game non ne avrete in più, ma se conoscete Worms penso che abbiate già messo in conto quest'eventualità)

author: {'steamid': '76561198272128966', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1562063809}
review:
Better than nothing... but not really a fan of the editions like this one that don't allow setting infinite move time and near-infinite round time for setting up some really gritty modes.

They should also turn off the extra dirt in the UI when not playing with coin drops.  It makes them look really stupid having that extra junk in weapons selector... oh, wait, the UI designers ARE really stupid for not doing this in the first place.  And what's with the use of angle brackets in the UI text?  Looks really sloppy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970738873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1560910887}
review:
Now, if you're looking for a more modern Worms game, then this one is pretty good.
While it doesn't seem to have as many in-game items, it does have Workshop support, so that should be easily fixed.
Supporting everything as of 2019, it offers HD res and modern graphic settings.

It seems to lose a little of the charm of the earlier titles though, although I can't put my finger on why.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135445239', 'num_games_owned': 602, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1559483375}
review:
КАЗУАЛЬНО;
ВЕСЕЛО;
ДОРАБОТАННЫЙ REVOLUTION.


Worms Clan Wars — мультиплатформенная компьютерная игра серии Worms в жанре пошаговая стратегия, разработанная и изданная компанией Team17 в сервисе цифровой дистрибуции Steam 15 августа 2013 года для Windows, 20 февраля 2014 года для Macintosh и 2 марта 2015 года для Linux.

Игра является идейным продолжением  Worms Revolution. Основы механики полностью взяты оттуда и упрощена. Произвели ребаланс различного оружия и фишек.

Плюсы:
1. Хорошая и приятная графика
2. Это все тот же Worms Revolution, только динамичнее, веселее и драйвовее.
3. Огромное кол-во различного оружия.
4. Неплохой режим кампании (В рамках данной серии, естественно)



минусы:
1. Мертвый мультиплеер.
2. Огромное количество различных багов. От визуальных до тех, которые ломают игру.




В принципе, если брать с бандлом, то это отличная игра с друзьями или с близкими на вечерок!

author: {'steamid': '76561198014693317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1001, 'last_played': 1579697898}
review: I'm not recommending this one as it's so bugged. Some of the bugs are really annoying, as you need to start game from the start, because you've to wait eternaly for the neverending turn (usually that's CPU's (in the story mode), but it can be also during anyone's turn) to complete. There are some problems with the controls (rope and so on), bugged crates (this is the root of the above mentioned bug, as a lot of projectiles (for example: cluster grenade parts) aren't exploding, as they should, but just getting stuck in there), unphisically moving fluid/water and so on... Team 17 just couldn't make anything better then Worms Armageddon.

review: Самый лучшие черви в стиме на данный момент! Тупо воркшоп решает. W.M.D. модет тоже не плох, но дело даже не в механике или графике, просто без спичбанков играть довольно скучно т.к. прям свежих механик нету, это все те же старые черви, да с водой, да в THREE DEEE, с классами червей, но это не сильно что либо меняет. Если у вас есть два три друга  в  берите, потому что онлайн мертв сам по себе, а вот с друзьям помеситься в закрытой сессии, да с рофельными спичбанками, которых хоть жопой жуй (а можно еще и своих наделать, что меня боьше всего и привлекает), бесценно!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198095634087', 'num_games_owned': 2883, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 392, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 392, 'last_played': 1551579051}
review: Tried to play through single-player campaign and dropped it. Incased Worms mission is a pinnacle of bad level design in this game. Although, maybe there are even worse missions later on, I don't know, I wouldn't be surprised. That is to add to awful controls, UI and camera, pointless and ugly 3D presentation, bad physics and slow and stupid AI. Feels worse in many aspects than the very first Worms game as I remember it (not too nostalgically). I am now on a quest to find a good Worms game, wondering if one even exists.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019146834', 'num_games_owned': 1217, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 1389, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1290, 'last_played': 1549739493}
review: Being the second Worms game I play, I can only say this one has a story and you need to complete missions. It's hard and unforgiving in most late-stage missions, which is both frustrating and good for the game's duration. For it's price on discount, it's a good pickup if you're looking for some Worms action.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063343952', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1550534080}
review: Ein witziges Worms, dass aber hin und wieder für Frust sorgen kann. Ich glaube aber, dass das normal bei diesem Spiel ist. Zumindest habe ich diese Erfahrung gemacht, da ich das mit dem Zielen nicht so hin bekomme. Die Steuerung, lässt sich Individuell anpassen...was man vielleicht auch tun sollte, da es sonst sehr Gewöhnungsbedürftig ist. Für Liebhaber der Reihe ein weiteres Lustiges Spielerlebnis im Worms Universum.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062813911', 'num_games_owned': 1952, 'num_reviews': 2041, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1549816425}
review:
[h1] DISCLAIMER: This is a first impressions review, and NOT a full review [/h1]

Worms Clan Wars is a game developed and published by Team 17 Digital Ltd.

The game offers some pleasant graphics and really vibrant colours, although some ugly glitches here and there, it is pleasant all the same

The game does suffer with some repetitiveness at certain areas of the game but a fun game nonetheless

Worms Clan Wars overall, however, is a fun game to play, yet sometimes flawed, but is a great strategy game to play in short bursts!

[h1] RECOMMENDED :) [/h1]

review:
Es worms no hace falta decir mas.
Una jugabilidad adictiva pero es mas para pasar el rato con amigos, si lo quieres jugar solo tienes la campaña de una dificultad bastante facil y las operaciones gusanas que te enseña mas que nada lo basico.
Aunque si juegas solo puedes defender tu clan pero a estas alturas el online no es tan abundante como lo fue en su epoca,pero lo recomiendo si es en ofertas y en compañia de tus amigos.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998194190', 'num_games_owned': 259, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1546092907}
review:
O jogo é engraçadinho. Mas falta as legendas em portugues no mínimo.

outra o tempo de uma jogada para outra, chega a ser estressante, toda vez o Worms tem que fazer uma animação ou falar alguma coisa. Se 4 players ja demora, com essas animações acaba demorando muito mais. Teria que ter uma configuração para remover as animações ou botão de pular elas, fica muito demorando acaba ficando cansativo.

Outra é que voce sai do jogo ele fica com o som do jogo ainda, está contando várias horas de jogo, mas a sensação é que apenas joguei 30 minutos, pois é muita animação.

author: {'steamid': '76561198403024518', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1546293104}

author: {'steamid': '76561198085490175', 'num_games_owned': 541, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 6563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3138, 'last_played': 1699686185}
review:
Pros: Very fun game, also pretty cheap in the frequent sales. Includes Multiplayer as well as Singleplayer. Has very many options to customize your gaming experience. The game has a surprisingly high gameplay-depth which will surprise you with little tricks and new strategies even a few dozen hours in it while it doesn't really give you a lot of info about those gameplay basics itself if you don't want to sit through the tiring Singleplayer-tutorials. You may want to go check out one of the guides available.

Cons: Barely any players available online (go play between 9 o' clock PM and 1 o' clock AM if you want to find any matches, the rest of the time the lobby-list is just a barren wasteland) and if you try to find a game as solo-player you'll always get kicked out of the few open lobbies people have opened for their friends. (Or even worse, they'll team against you unfairly.) Suboptimal technical execution of the game. (I had friends lagging even on high spec computers as it doesn't seem to use graphics cards properly or has a gigantic amount of unnecessary background calculating going on. Also it's worth noting that everything has a bit of a delay, which isn't game breaking though as the game is turn based anyways. Just make sure not to wait until the last second of your turn to take your action and then start complaining that the camera didn't scroll out and over to the enemy worm in time.) Rarely the game also has glitches getting one of your worms stuck in a gap they just crawled in themselves or the water can extremely rarely defy physics and keep moving upwards and downwards inside a hole, essentially making it impossible to continue the match as it won't let you start your next turn.

TL;DR: Good and pretty cheap game with quite a few technical flaws and too few people available for playing it online. Can be excellent fun with friends, but please don't be one of those unsocial bastards kicking random single people out of their lobby and especially don't start teaming against solo players with your friends thinking you're so cool for doing it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078374315', 'num_games_owned': 1037, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1545741699}
review:
Mimo, że Wormsy to jedna z serii mojego dzieciństwa nie mogę polecić tej gry.

* grafika wygląda jakby nie mogła się zdecydować pomiędzy 2D, a 3D i jest brzydka
  (już Worms 2 i World Party wyglądają lepiej od tej części) 
* narratorka ma dla mnie tak irytujący ton wypowiedzi, że nie mogę wytrzymać
* brak polskiego dubbingu, który był w poprzednich częściach (psuje immersję)
* nikt w nią nie gra (można zapomnieć o rozgrywce wieloosobowej)

review:
One of worst games in franchise. Encountered a game braking bug even on first time I played. 
Team 17 is one of worst developers out there. They just repackage the same game for over 20 years, they just add a thing or two. It wouldnt be a problem if the games werent getting any worse.  More bugs on top of bugs, every year new release, and no people to play online.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053165458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1531779753}
review:
I have played many Worms games. The best one to be Worms World Party by far.

This one is, honestly, the worst I have ever played.

It's like none of the producers of this game ever played an old Worms game. They put in some really ugly 3D models for the worms, ugly 3D water which nobody wanted and finally removed every good feature, like the many ways to customize like EVERYTHING in the game.

It's just sad to see what this game has become. 

0/10 would never recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198305281749', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1496686761}
review: This game had promise, but on my laptop, despite it being a basic 2D game, it was horrendously optimized, like seriously bad. author: {'steamid': '76561198144730411', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1543087302}
review: Ich hatte mir dieses Spiel gekauft in der Hoffnung, es tatsächlich auch nach dem Tutorial noch spielen zu können. Allerdings ist dies unter Linux offensichtlich gar nicht möglich. Schade, es sah eigentlich nach einem guten Spiel aus, was man mit Freunden prima zusammen spielen könnte. Das Problem mit dem Spielecrash nach dem Tutorial scheint schon verbreitet zu sein, allerdings habe ich bisher keine Lösung finden können, wie man dies umgehen könnte. Es scheint auch bei allerlei Linux-Distributionen aufzutauchen. Die einzige Möglichkeit, die ich hier sehe, ist das Spiel zurückzugeben. Für Linux-Nutzer ist dieses Spiel auf jedenfall nicht zu empfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012460330', 'num_games_owned': 337, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3217, 'last_played': 1692021033}
review:
By far the best Worms game in the series, no game other than WCW has provided such long and repeatable laughter and fun. No matter how you play, who you play with or the settings you choose there is always never ending fun and new things to try. Best played over voice chat with a friend or family member, it's entertainment for all ages. 

Boosted with a humorous and charming soundtrack, pretty visuals and the ability to create and customize your own landscapes to your liking. If you don't feel like creating your own map or playing one of the great randomly generated Worms maps, there is a wealth of extra content available through the Steam Workshop. From Landscapes to Worm customizations.

Games are typically short, allowing for an intense experience, every turn could mean your loss or win of the match. Not to include the random crate spawns around the map. You never know what lies beneath, it could give you a serious advantage in firepower, coins to purchase new weapons or the ability to move around in sticky situations.

I would recommend this game to groups of friends and families, it's where it truly shines

author: {'steamid': '76561198048908940', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 154, 'playtime_forever': 2245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2020, 'last_played': 1684136976}

author: {'steamid': '76561197977334381', 'num_games_owned': 481, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1541348164}
review:
Étant fan de la saga des worms, je peux vous dire que ce worms m'a littéralement déçu.

- Le gameplay est très mauvais comparé au précédent et nouveau Worms.
- Les graphismes et les maps sont horribles.
- Le jeu n'est pas optimisé, Il y a des coups de lag et des chutes de FPS de temps en temps.
- Le mode multijoueur, bug soudainement et se fige ce qui fait crash la partie.

Je vous conseille, Worms Reloaded pour les personnes à faible budget, où le tout nouveau Worms W.M.D qui est un peut plus chère mais vous ne serez pas déçu !
