author: {'steamid': '76561198031569409', 'num_games_owned': 844, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1463187186}
review:
This is a Worms Revolution 1.5. Still a average Worms with ugly graphics.

The solo campaign, like in Revolution, is very interesting, for a Worms game. But not the multiplayer section...

It's almost exactly like its predecessor, Worms Revolution : the class-system (A very bad concept for random deathmatches, but a good one for scripted solo compaign),  dynamic water (that was cool) and water-related weapons ; 

What's new ? Little tweaks about physics and classes, bigger maps availables, and some useles features : like beeing part of a Clan (but given that nobody play it anymore, it's useless) and basically, if your are ready to pay all the shitload of DLC in Revolution, Revolution seems to have more content,better themes and more options to customize.

In fact, i don't really understand the point of this game. It's like what WWP was to Armaggedon. Guess what ? People continue playing Armgaddeon, and WWP is dead. 

So, which one to buy ?

If you want to try theses new concepts and you hesitate between buying Revolution or Clan Wars, I would say go for Clan Wars ; 
But if you already have Revolution, buy Clan Wars only if u loved and finished Revolution campaigns, and still want more. That's it.

For playing against humans, play Reloaded (very basic, maybe too much) or W.MP (it's like Reloaded but with new optionnal features, like map-buildings, turrets, vehicules, in-game crafting)  instead, thoses are great games (or Armageddon if you are a hardcome ninja-rope gamer stuck in the 90's)

author: {'steamid': '76561198014801340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 20, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1709845431}
review:
Ich rezensiere ja eigentlich ungern Spiele negativ, da ich weiß, wie viel Arbeit drinsteckt und ich nach dem Motto lebe "Wenn du nix Gutes zu sagen hast, sag lieber gar nix". Aber in der Worms Reihe stecken für mich viele Kindheitserinnerungen (Worms 1 mit der ikonischen Musik und den superwitzigen Videos habe ich wirklich geliebt). Und dieses Spiel macht einfach leider so vieles falsch.

- Die Steuerung ist wirklich furchtbar. Springen mit Shift-Links?! Wer hat sich das denn ausgedacht? Ja-ha, man kann die Steuerung ändern, aber dann funktionieren Waffen plötzlich nicht mehr (Story-Mission, das Ufo in einer der ersten Missionen ließ sich erst benutzen, als ich die Steuerung auf Default zurückgestellt hatte).
- Es fehlt sämtliche wiedererkennbare Musik und der alte Humor wurde durch eine komische Pseudo-Grabräuberin ersetzt, die aus irgendeinem Grund alles kommentiert
- Viele Rätsel echt einfach nur unnötig schwer. Nicht in erster Linie der Rätsel wegen, sondern weil man null Hinweise bekommt, was man tun soll.
- Ich finde es gut, dass es unterschiedliche Klassen von Würmern gibt - aber hätte man über deren Eigenheiten nicht etwas besser informiert werden können? Dass die Kundschafter erheblich weniger Schaden beim Dragonball-Angriff machen als die Schläger hätte man durchaus mal erwähnen können.
- Aktuell hänge ich an  einer Mission, in der man eine Typen aus einem Reifen retten muss. Nachdem ich knapp innerhalb des Zeitlimits alle Gegner besiegt habe und eigentlich das Ende der Mission erwarte, sagt mir das Spiel einfach nicht, wie es weitergeht? Der Typ säuft einfach ab. Tja, schade. 
- Warum muss es mit jedem Spiel neue Waffen geben, die immer taktischer werden? Was ist mit dem guten alten Betonesel oder Armageddon? Wieso braucht es jetzt Telekinese, Tele-Tausch und Ufo?

Zumindest der Story-Modus ist definitiv nicht zu empfehlen. Die Missionen sind einfach zu scheiße.

Okay, ein oder zwei Dinge hat das Spiel auch richtig gemacht, zum Beispiel:
+ Wasser als Umgebungselement hat mir gut gefallen - Wasserkanonen erweitern zwar auch das Arsenal (siehe oben), aber hier kann man es verschmerzen. Jeder mag das Gefühl, einen Haufen Würmer mit einem Schwall Wasser in den Abgrund zu spritzen
+ Das Level-Design ist ganz nett

Insgesamt: Das Spiel und damit meine ich insbesondere den Story-Modus ist nicht zu empfehlen, auch  nicht für 5 €. Wie viel Spaß das Spiel online macht, weiß ich nicht und werde ich vermutlich auch nicht herausfinden. Für mich ist das ein "minderwertiger Sohn größerer Herren".  So wie Théoden. Nur uncooler.

author: {'steamid': '76561198300270231', 'num_games_owned': 5361, 'num_reviews': 893, 'playtime_forever': 2089, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1592, 'last_played': 1537993393}
review:
그 옛날, 동생이 영어 단어도 제대로 못 읽어 "행님, 지렁이 포트리스 하자" 라고 부르곤 했던 '웜즈' 시리즈의 [b]《웜즈 집단 전쟁》[/b]이다. 처음 이걸 스팀에서 보고, 나는 금방 향수에 빠져버렸다. 하나의 키보드를 두고 동생이랑 같이 웜즈를 했던 기억이 새록새록 뇌 속에서 줄기 처럼 뻗어 나왔다. "아, 당나귀 콘크리트는 사기템이니까 쓰지 말라고!" 투정 섞인 목소리 마저 귓가에 아련하게 맴돌았다. 비록 내 기억 속의 '웜즈' 와는 그래픽도, 무기의 목록도, 생김새도 달라졌으나, 역시 그 특유의 재미는 어느 정도 느낄 수 있었다.

+ 아기자기한 그래픽에, 캐주얼한 게임성으로 어린이들도 즐길 수 있다
+ 모든 무기들의 효과음이 상당히 좋은 편
+ 각기 다른 체형과 스텟을 지닌 4마리의 웜즈
+ 로컬 플레이에서 '미션 모드' 가 가능하다
+ 역시 웜즈 답게, 실로 다양한 무기들이 준비되어 있다
+ 스팀 트레이딩 카드 존재(플탐 대비 파밍시간 적절)

- 역시 웜즈는 웜즈, 사람이랑 안 하면 재미가 없다
- 근데 문제는 이 게임 멀티가 이미 죽었다는 것이다
- 도전과제를 하려면 부스팅할 인원이 필요하다
- 커스텀 맵을 어떻게 인게임에 적용하는지 모르겠다(아는 사람이 없나 봐, 검색해도 안 나와)

대체 유튜브에 커스텀 맵으로 친구들과 플레이한 사람은 어떻게 한 것일까? 토론글에 질문을 올려도, 보름이 넘게 아무도 답변을 안 달아주더라. 하긴, 게임이 죽었는데, 포럼이 살아있을리가 없지. 게임성 자체는 여전히 괜찮다. 와, 진짜 다른 사람이랑 같이 치고 박고 하면 개꿀잼일 거야. 근데 다른 사람이랑 매칭이 안 잡히네? 답 나오지. 개발자가 게임을 만들어놨는데, 유저가 '메인 컨텐츠' 를 전혀 즐길 수 없는 상황이다. 지금의 환경에선 엄지를 내리는 게 맞고, 앞으로도 게임이 살아날 가망성은 없을 것이다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063209433', 'num_games_owned': 601, 'num_reviews': 235, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1617482520}
review:
The game is broken and completely unplayable - it hangs on the first loading screen after finishing the tutorial.
We can see the bug was reported here in [b]report bugs[/b] section more than a year ago https://steamcommunity.com/app/233840/discussions/1/1290691308579921472/ and here https://steamcommunity.com/app/233840/discussions/1/1290691308584156386/

There is not even a single developer reaction. I originally thought it's happening because I use Arch Linux (a distro not supported officially) so I jumped into my Ubuntu 18.04 LTS x64 partition and it's exactly the same. I'd be ok if it was only happening on Arch because it's a rolling release distro but the current Ubuntu LTS is a necessity and it should work 100%.

You disappointed me Team17 after the perfect port of Worms Reloaded. I will try reporting this issue using alternative methods and will refund the game if I won't get an official reaction in a week.
I will update the review as soon as I get some news but for now I can't recommend it, it's a waste of money right now.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992277997', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1534592925}
review:
[h1]DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!!![/h1]
(Unless of course you happen to live in Wakefield, UK, close to the Team17 Studio - then at least you could easily take your and everyone else's rage and frustration out on them afterwards.)

The HUGE problem with this game is that, no matter how low you turn your settings, on many setups the game for no good reason runs in slideshow mode giving you a whopping <10fps (and yes, ladies and gentlemen, that's on a highly-specced system of 2017). The devs have been on it for 5 years now without any results. Just check out the discussion board which will back this claim up.
Of course how dare I compare The Witcher 3 with all settings maxed in 4k to the pristine specimen that is Worms Clan Wars. But I digress.

Another thing - what good are turn timers if you have to wait 3-4 seconds on the weapon select screen for a popup to appear so you can try to figure out what a particular weapon icon even is? Not the right weapon for you? No problem, just wait another 3-4 seconds to see what the next one is. It's not like we're in a rus..... wait what? Turn's over?

I totally didn't mention the fact that you get started off with a seemingly unskippable tutorial which gets you stuck when failing to ninja rope caused by all input latency going up by one second as soon as the rope is attached. Your ninja rope will then disappear never to return getting you stuck in a pit - forever. Only then, when you attempt to quit the game out of frustration it turns out that trying to do so just ends the tutorial - exactly what you wanted to do in the first place.

Admittedly, it does introduce some nice new ideas into the Worms genre - even though I really don't care for the 3D aesthetic and wannabe high-accuracy physics simulation in a game like this. And that's really the only good thing I can say about it - nice idea but abyssmal execution - do your sanity a favor and return to Worms Reloaded / Armageddon.

Team 17 should really just stick to publishing at this point and stop ruining their own name even further if they don't have anyone who can write a proper games anymore. Just keep mooching off of other's genious like with Ghost Town Game's Overcooked and Overcooked 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198188578901', 'num_games_owned': 2526, 'num_reviews': 956, 'playtime_forever': 553, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 553, 'last_played': 1529759906}
review:
2 boyutlu Worms serisinin Revolution'dan sonra çıkan oyunu. Brute Worm, scientist gibi Revolution'da ortaya çıkan işlevsel sınıflar işe yaramış olmalı ki burada da aynen devam edilmiş. Solucanları çeşitlendirmek mantıklı kesinlikle. Yüksek damage veya hareketlilik açısından solucanların farklı oluşu, taktikselliğe bambaşka bir boyut kazandırıyor.
Oynanış bildiğimiz şekilde kalmaya devam ediyor. Yeni senaryo ve görevler var. Silah çeşitlerinde minimal bir artış olsa da bildiğimiz silahlardan çok da farklı değil. Senaryolarda ağır silahların (muz bombası, holy grenade, eşşek) daha çok kullanılıyor oluşu ise eminim tüm Worms sevenlerin hoşuna gidecektir.
Yeni seriye olumsuz bakanların konusuna değinmek istiyorum. Bu oyunlardan oynadıktan sonra Armageddon veya World Party oynamayı denemişler mi bir sormak lazım. Denedim ve oynanabilirlikteki düşüşe hayret ettim. Evet, ben de eski oyunların sevicisiyim ama eskide kalmış bu oyunların yerini tutmadığını düşünerek şimdiki oyunlara olumsuz atan güruh, aslında eski seriyi değil çocukluğunu özlüyor. O zevki geri getiremeyeceksiniz malesef. Deneyin ve farkı görün. Halen Armageddon ve World Party'nin Reloaded, Revolution ve Clan Wars'tan daha iyi olduğunu düşünenler kusura bakmasın, oyundan anlamıyorlar demektir. GTA 4'e GTA 5'ten daha güzel demek gibi bir şey olur bu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012924010', 'num_games_owned': 717, 'num_reviews': 319, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1587761498}
review:
Die Worms-Reihe ist eine lustig gestaltete und amüsante Art von Spiel, welche sich besonders mit Freunden gut genießen lässt. Das gegenseite Verspotten und beglückwünschen macht nach schwierigen Schüssen und gleichermaßen verfehlten Blindgängern Spaß und gute Laune. Der Teil "Clan Wars" bietet viele verschieden Items, Freiheit, was gestaltung der Maps und Spieleinstellungen angeht und sowohl einen Funktionierenden Multiplayer als auch einen Singleplayer. Die Graphik ist nicht grandios, ist aber devinitiv verkraftbar. Ich empfehle es allen Leuten, die Kollegen zum Spielen haben. Einzelgängern würde ich eher ein anderes Spiel ans Herz legen.


Wenn ich es Zocke Stream ich es auch www.twitch.tv/zumlustigenschnitzlwirt

author: {'steamid': '76561198043096944', 'num_games_owned': 507, 'num_reviews': 218, 'playtime_forever': 967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 967, 'last_played': 1528620870}
review:
Routiniertes sowie spaßiges Worms. Wer ein Worms ala Reloaded erwartet, sollte seine Ansprüche vielleicht ein wenig runterfahren. Worms konzentriert sich genau auf das was es kann und führt dies eben auch wie gewohnt aus. Warum soll man dann seine Ansprüche etwas herunterfahren? Ganz einfach, in der reinen Kampagne empfand ich die Missionen zu ähnlich, wenn auch nicht schlecht gemacht, die Frustmomente waren zwar in Reloaded auch vorhanden, aber hier ist die Atmosphäre nicht ganz so dicht und zudem nicht ganz so motivierend, sodass der Funke wie in Reloaded nicht so ganz herübersprang. Knapp 16 Stunden habe ich mir für die Story zeit gelassen und bin nun froh, es geschafft zu haben.
Wer gerne Worms spielt und mehr vom Universum haben möchte, ist hier genau richtig, wer neu bei der Reihe ist, sollte zumindest von den neuen erstmal Reloaded spielen, bzw. warten bis Worms Clan Wars rabattiert ist.

Wertung: 73 / 100

[i] The return to the worms was a nice change for me. A long time ago I played this title and I had a lot of fun because of it and nothing has changed. author: {'steamid': '76561198139344280', 'num_games_owned': 475, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 1758, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1357, 'last_played': 1641050648}
review:
[h1][b]Worms Clan Wars[/b] - Im Soge des Wurms[/h1]

[i]Clan Wars[/i] ist der zweitneueste Ableger der altehrwürdigen Worms-Reihe aka "Waas, das gibt schon Fallschaden!?" oder "Wie fliegt man dieses Superschaf bitte nicht gegen die nächstbeste Wand??". Im Gegensatz zum aktuellen Ableger [i]W.M.D[/i], der mit umfangreichem Crafting und begehbaren Gebäuden einiges anders macht, kann man Clan Wars im Grunde als ein ziemlich klassischer Teil in die Strategiereihe einordnen. 

[b]Der Name war Programm[/b]
Eine der größten Neuerungen, die Entwickler [i]Team17[/i] ins Spiel gebracht hat, ist der ausgebaute Online-Modus. So lässt sich nun ein eigener Clan mit allem Drum und Dran gründen. Allzu genau möchte ich auf dieses Feature aber gar nicht eingehen, denn leider habe ich trotz mehreren Versuchen kein Clan-Match gefunden. Viereinhalb Jahre nach Release haben sich die Spieler interessanterweise ziemlich gleichmäßig auf alle möglichen Worms-Ableger aufgeteilt (mit [i]Armageddon[/i] als positver Ausreißer nach oben) - für regelmäßige Online-Matches im Clan-Modus reicht die Spieleranzahl leider nicht mehr. Im normalen Online-Multiplayer finden sich dagegen zumindest abends weiterhin Matches.
Damit geht dem Spiel eine prominente Neuerung also leider ab. Wer noch kein Worms-Spiel in seiner Bibliothek hat und wem W.M.D zu viel anders macht, dem kann ich Clan Wars allerdings trotzdem empfehlen. Das klassische Gameplay und unkaputtbare Spielprinzip macht auch nach etlichen Jahren noch richtig viel Spaß und durch neue Waffen und Physik-Verbesserungen wurde immer wieder neues Holz nachgelegt. Zum Beispiel wäre da das vorbildliche und nachvollziehbare Wasser-Verhalten als Spielelement zu nennen. Als neues Gadget gibt es dafür neben neun weiteren Vernichtungshelfern das Aqua Pack, mit dem im Jetpack-Stil gegnerische Würmer von der Map geschwemmt werden können. Außerdem können die wabbeligen Weichtiere natürlich weiterhin auf das sehr umfangreiche und einfallsreiche Waffenarsenal mit Klassikern wie der Bazooka, Bananen-Bombe oder Heiligen Handgranate zurückgreifen. Diese Auswahl in Verbindung mit den Eigenschaften der jeweiligen Wurm-Typen und den Gegebenheiten der Maps sorgen für taktische Tiefe und die Qual der Wahl bei der Suche nach der richtigen Waffe für die richtige Situation. Für Neulinge kann dieser Umstand aber auch frustrierend sein, denn eine Möglichkeit, alle Gadgets ohne Risiko auf Verlust in Ruhe zu testen, gibt es nicht. In der Kampagne oder bei den Wurm-Ops ist das zwar begrenzt möglich (dazu unten mehr) aber eine risikofreie Spielwiese, um vielleicht sogar das verdammte Superschaf unter Kontrolle zu bringen, gibt es nicht.

[b]Von Schwankungen und Wendungen[/b]
In puncto Spielmodi wird auch abseits der großteils verwaisten Clans einiges geboten. Zum einen ist da der klassische, lokale Multiplayer, der sicherlich schon den einen oder anderen Familienfrieden gefährdet hat. Dazu kommt der reguläre Online-Modus, der durch viele Einstellungsmöglichkeiten (z.B. nur Bazookas und Granaten) individualisiert werden kann. Zumindest im populären Deathmatch-Modus war hier die Spielersuche wie oben erwähnt bei mir kein Problem.
Auch Singleplayer-Liebhabern will Worms Clan Wars etwas bieten und fährt dazu eine umfangreiche Kampagne auf. Storymäßig sollte man nicht allzu viel erwarten, denn die Jagd auf den bösen Lord Mesmer und seine heimtückischen Pläne verläuft nahezu ohne jeglichen Spannungsbogen. Etwas Charme bekommt die Geschichte nur durch unsere gierige aber recht unterhaltsame Auftraggeberin Tara Pinkle und die ulkige Natur unserer Würmer. Das Leveldesign der Kampagnenmissionen hat mich anfangs negativ überrascht und sich eher wie ein halbherziges Tutorial angefühlt. Nach einigen Abschnitten wurden die Level jedoch interessanter und fordernder. Letztendlich blieben bei mir nach der je nach Skill und/oder Tollpatschigkeit etwa zehn Stunden langen Tournee gemischte Eindrücke zurück. Einige Level waren frustrierend schwer, von Bugs geplagt oder haben nicht so recht in das Rundenstrategie-System des Spiels gepasst - auf der anderen Seite gab es aber auch wirklich spaßige Abschnitte, die so in normalen Matches kaum zustande kommen würden. Am besten mal selbst reinspielen und sich nicht von den lahmen, ersten Level abschrecken lassen.
Die Wurm-Ops-Missionen haben ein ähnliches Bild abgegeben: oft banal und einfach und in einem bis zwei Fällen dafür einfach nur dämlich und frustrierend. Nach Abschluss war ich tatsächlich ein besserer Wurm an der Bazooka oder mit der Granate - der Spaß blieb aber teilweise auf der Strecke.
Zuletzt aber noch ein lobendes Wort: Die [i]Steam Workshop[/i]-Integration erlaubt ein umfassendes, buntes Anpassen unserer Lieblings-Wutwürmer mit Voice-Samples, Dekoartikel und eigenen Karten aus der Community. Eine gute Entscheidung von Team17!

FAZIT
[h1]Clankriege finden in Worms Clan Wars leider eher nicht mehr statt. Der im Vergleich zu W.M.D ziemlich klassische Spielablauf und das zeitlose Waffen-Arsenal machen Clan Wars aber trotzdem lohnenswert für Spieler, die noch kein Worms in der Bibliothek haben und ein halbwegs aktuelles Game suchen, das sich trotzdem nicht zu sehr vom ersten Teil entfernt![/h1]

WERTUNG
[h1]75[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198269745907', 'num_games_owned': 71, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 391, 'last_played': 1696177939}
review:
Le jeu est très bob, il me rappelle les souvenir de worms world party sur PS1

Le problème c'est l'optimisation pour les processeurs multi core, c'est simple, avec une gt 740 2go gDDr5, un athlon ii x4 945 et 16 go RAM DDR4, je jeu tourne en low Full HD 40 FPS, alors que sur mon pc portable AMD e1-6010 avec partie graphique Radeon R2 et 4go RAM DDR3, le jeu tourne en ultra Full HD 30 FPS

Merci de prendre concience de cette optimisation plus qu'a chier, on est en 2018 et c'est toujours pas réglé

PS : Achetez des dual core, pour ces jeux la pas de problemes :D (c'est un troll)

author: {'steamid': '76561197972282142', 'num_games_owned': 892, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 1009, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 992, 'last_played': 1663500350}
review:
I have all the Worms games on Xbox and play them mostly on there, so ignore my low hours on the PC versions - they are not a true pointer to the time spent in the game.

Of all the Worms games, including WMD, this is my absolute fave. I love it. There's something about the water physics that really makes it stand out. The only other good water physics game I know of is ORGANIC PANIC, and it's done even better in that game - shame the game itself isn't very good.

The water in this makes for some outstanding situations. WMD is just a repetition on the formula - this game contains a tangent that makes it stand out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050428495', 'num_games_owned': 90, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 4242, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2534, 'last_played': 1689127630}
review:
Hehe.
Praktycznie zerowe różnice od Worms Revolution, tak lekkie że dałoby się zmieścić to w jednej aktualizacji.
Ale nie, dodamy ubogi system klanów, wyższe wymagania (?!), a przy tym chujową optymalizację, i nazwiemy to kompletnie nową grą, hell yeah!

Cieszę się, że T17 poprawiło wszystko wraz z WMD, ale to nie zmieni faktu, że WCW to po prostu DLC do Revolution, za które płacisz więcej niż powinieneś.

Nie kupuj WCW, wydaj mniej na Revolution i miej przy tym pewność, że Ci pójdzie.

Adios.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024611441', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1475772945}
review:
Średniak... Grałem 5 godzin. Próbowałem jakoś przekonać się do tego tytułu. Nie mogłem.

Mam wrażenie, jakby ta gra była robiona na kolanie, podczas długiej przerwy w szkole. Stylistyka tej gry w żaden sposób do mnie nie przemawia. Tło zlewa się z obiektami, przez co bardzo często uderzamy w "niewidzialne ściany". Gameplayowo też jest średnio. Jako gracza, który trochę w Wormsy pogrywał, w Clan Worsach się nudziłem i patrzyłem na tytuł z kwaśną miną. Nie będę więcej narzekał na ten tytuł, ponieważ już na samym początku stwierdziłem, iż to zwykły średniak.

Mam jednak dobrą wiadomość. Najnowsze Wormsy W.M.D to jedna z najlepszych odsłon cyklu. Warto więc dołożyć kilkadziesiąt złotych i cieszyć się mega grywalną i udaną odsłoną robaków. W Clan Worsy można też pograć i samemu zobaczyć jak to jest naprawdę... 

Ja jednak nie polecam, a jako alternatywę daję Worms W.M.D!

author: {'steamid': '76561198010560368', 'num_games_owned': 1183, 'num_reviews': 703, 'playtime_forever': 855, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 745, 'last_played': 1503484043}
review:
Worms Clan Wars я бы назвал неудачным экспериментом Team17. Игра по все параметрам проигрывает тем же Worms: Reloaded, вышедшая двумя годами раннее. Попробую по пунктам:
1) Отвратительная оптимизация. Несмотря на то, что показывало стабильно 60 фпс, игралось будто на 20 кадрах.
2) Ужасная графика, не знаю чем Team17 не понравилась псевдо-3D из Reloaded, здесь все объекты в 3D и очень часто рельеф выглядел как фон, а фон - как рельеф, и часто возникали ситуации, когда червь вроде приземлялся на землю, а это фон и он падал в воду, очень бесило.
3) Разные классы червей. Впервые в серии Worms, черви стали неравноценными. Есть толстые черви, которые медленно передвигаются, плохо прыгают, но сильно дамажут, есть мелкие черви, которые являются полной противоположность толстым. Не могу сказать, что это минус, но выглядит это странно и, на мой взгляд, не нужно.
4) Скучный арсенал оружия, так получилось, что за 20 миссий ничем кроме базуки, дробовика, веревки и джетпака ничем не пользовался. Причину я вижу в том, что остальные оружия слишком редки, скучны, неэффективны. Остались веселые супер-овцы, банановые гранаты и ослы, но нового веселого оружия игра не привнесла.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068538496', 'num_games_owned': 547, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 3277, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1691, 'last_played': 1581023777}

review:
[h1] Worms Clan Wars	[/h1]
[i] Saving Private Worm.	[/i]

[b] Pros:	[/b]
Campaign is both challenging and enjoyable.
Workshop maps made for some interesting duels.
Voice packs and cosmetics from the workshop brought instant replay value.

[b] Cons:	[/b]
Latency isn't handled well and results in REALLY slow games.
Friends not loading in properly sometimes was a minor inconvenience.

[b] Overall Rating:	[/b]7/10

review:
Well it's pretty fun but if you plan on playing vs the AI, then you better stay away. The AI gets permenent electromagnets, meaning, they just have to put one of these down once, and they are virtually invincible forever. It's possible to subvert this with digging etc but virtually impossible most of the time. 


Really makes the game junk.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091395938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 2541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 737, 'last_played': 1523204916}
review:
Die Menü Steuerung ist ne zumutung vor allem im Karten Editor mit nem Gamepad. 
Die Story hat nichts zu bieten ausser Teils unfaire Sprung-passagen und try and die Müll. 
Es gibt nur eine Handvoll Landschaftstyppen und bei einiegen sind Vorder und Hintergrund kaum zu Unterscheiden, vorallem für Leute mit Farbschwäche oder Farbenblindheit ist die Asia Landschaft eine Zumutung und die Prähistorische Landschaft ist nur geringfügig besser was bedeutet das nur Industrie, Vikinger und Maya landschafts typen überbleiben, was ein Witz ist. Es gibt Demos mit mehr Umfang. 
Die neuen Waffen im Vergleich zum classiker Worms Armageddon sind kaum erwähnenswert und machen den sonstiegen fehlenden Umfang nicht wieder gut. Hinzu kommt das man keine eigenen KI Teams mehr machen kann, was sehr Schade ist und die KI ist extrem langsam, Sie braucht die 3 fache Zeit um einen Zug zu planen als in Worms 2 zum Vergleich. Die KI hat sich also enorm zurückentwickelt und es gibt auch keine Schewierigkeitsgrade mehr.

Viel schlechter als Viele Vorgänger Titel. Worms W.M.D oder die Klassiker sind Viel besser.

review:
Hey Ho zusammen . Also kommen wir mal zum Punkt des Rev.
Das Spiel ist klasse macht echt laune zu zocken ob Singelplayer (als gutes Tutorial zu sehen ;-) 

Ein mega Spaß mit Freunden zusammen zu zocken.
Was mir leider stark fehlt sind die Coolen Kill -Cams aus den vorherigen Teilen.
Wie oft habe ich ich mich gefreut und mit schadenfrohen Gelächter über die "perfekt" platzierte Granate oder Bazooka um die 3 Ecke,die meine Freunde zur weiß glut gebracht haben.

Wie gerne hätte ich diese momente noch mal ausgekostet in der Wiederholung.
Leider nicht möglich.....

Also dann möge der beste Worm obsiegen .
Greetz

review: This game is just flat out bad. Can't rebind the controls because it doesn't allow for double binding which often temporarily needs to  be done. My friends and I had trouble connecting to each others game and when we finally did it crashed upon starting. Once we got in the game there were all sorts of graphical errors and bugs. This game isn't worth the time or headaches to play. Worms used to be good but that time is no longer. Do not buy this game.

review:
Masz ZA DUŻO Przyjaciół?
Zagraj z nimi w Worms Clan Wars!!!!
Świetna gra do wspólnej zabawy z przyjaciółmi, twoje robale vs robale twojich kumpli.
Komiczne i skillowe sytuacje 
Od ciebie zależy jak zagrasz czy będziesz zawierał sujusze czy będziesz grał indywidualnie

Polecam 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198053265014', 'num_games_owned': 1339, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1487716224}
review: This episode is... okay. Not as fine as the old classic ones, but I think the good ideas introduced in Revolution are still saving it (I skipped Revolution, so these were new for me) - the water weapons, the buying system (weapons/utils for gold coins), some creative tools like Stick Up, although there are useless ones too (UFO, Winged Monkey, and Telekinesis never proved to be useful thus far). Some negative points are present, like physics/control bugs, and I didn't particularly like the graphic style either. However, if you catch this episode in a sale, it does worth a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028794153', 'num_games_owned': 1089, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1496514217}
review: Got this for cheap, so not super disappointed... but still I am. Almost every element of this game is annoying, which I suppose is to be expected on a thematic level, but not on a gameplay level. The "campaign" is an endless slog of bad jokes and poorly designed levels... it seems at one point the developers were trying to make a platformer, but repurposed those ideas for a bland and slow turn-based experience. In my experience, a game should be fun before it should be funny.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993689485', 'num_games_owned': 1435, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1609839528}
review:
I really wanted to like this game since I've been a worms fan since worms 2. The humour and music are there, but the graphics are cringy to me. Even after changing the resolution to 1080p and switching on anti-aliasing I could still see jagged edges. I understand the game is four years old, but it felt unforgivable. Despite the issues, I really enjoyed worms reloaded on release, but I can't recommend this. The gameplay feels arduously slow and the worm ops mission feel like a chore. Maybe it opens up later, but it didn't make me want to stick around to find out.

UPDATE: on spending some more time in the story missions I can see the core worms gameplay is intact. I have no interest in online multiplayer, so if you are looking for worms to play online, this may be worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970330504', 'num_games_owned': 391, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1521403922}

World party or armageddon still better in my books.

review:
AFK, et voilà ! 
Impossible de faire une partie correcte. Quand il y a quelqu'un sur les serveurs de worms, ce ne sont que de vulgaires enfo*rés venus pour faire chier. Soit ils squattent le salon toute la journée pour faire perdre du temps, soit ils lancent la partie et ne jouent même pas un seul coup...
Puis, faire un worms en 3d, c'est tout simplement d-bil, la physique en 2D fonctionnait super bien, maintenant il y a des erreurs de trajectoire, et ça lag sa mère même avec un i7 à 4ghz et une 960 gtx... pourri de chez pourri, il faut boycotter worms jusqu'à la fin des temps, et jouer à worms 2 uniquement

author: {'steamid': '76561198123357146', 'num_games_owned': 251, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1495742240}
review:
MP mode causes the game to crash on Mac, both creating a Lobby and joining one. This has been a known issue to the developers since 2015, but seemingly hasn't been worked on since 2016 anymore.

Game is full of bugs (both for Win and Mac), explosion sounds are missing randomly and visual glitches seem to be common.

Hitboxes fail regularly, causing for example the baseball bat to miss despite standing right next to a worm and swinging right through it.

A game like this shouldn't be sold on Steam in my opinion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017871223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 962, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 561, 'last_played': 1505143020}
review:
Ich bin mit Worms aufgewachsen und ein grosser Fan. Leider kann ich "Clan Wars" nicht empfehlen.

- Der online Multiplayer funktioniert nur wenn man Glück hat
- Die Spiellandschaft hebt sich kaum vom Hintergrund ab, das sieht zwar schick aus aber verwirrt beim spielen

Den Daumen runter gibt es vorallem wegen der Gestalltung Spiellandschaft/Hintergrund. Beim herauszoomen kann man teilweise kaum noch erkennen was zum Hintergrund gehört und was nicht. Das führt dann oft dazu dass Angriffe schief gehen wenn z.B. Granaten an einem Stück Landschaft abprallen weil man es mit dem Hintergrund verwechselt hat...

Wer gerne Worms spielt sollte IMHO auf "Clan Wars"  verzichten und zu einem anderen Titel der Serie greifen.

review: Jedna z lepszych odsłon "nowych" Wormsów. Dobry system rozgrywki, przyjemna grafika, możliwość tworzenia własnych dźwięków dla robaków i aren walk. Dostępne jest parenaście ciekawych misji do ukończenia. Niestety, po premierze Worms W.M.D, praktycznie niemożliwe jest znalezienie meczów Online, a szczególnie tytułowych walk klanów. Jednakże, jeśli już się uda odnaleźć kogoś do grania, to można się świetnie przy tym bawić. 7/10

review: Ich finde das Spiel selbst ziemlich gut, jedoch habe ich einen bug, den ich nicht weg bekomme... Im spiel ist es so, als würde ich die ganze Zeit auf die Pfeiltaste nach Oben drücken (sowohl im Game, z.B. Zielen, als auch im Menü) , obwohl dies nicht der Fall ist. Es liegt definitiv nicht an meiner Tastatur, sondern am Spiel, da dieser Fehler NUR bei diesem Spiel auftritt. Von daher würde ich dem Spiel nur 4 von 5 Sternen geben, da solche Fehler nicht bei einem Spiel auftreten sollten, welches schon so lange besteht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013395249', 'num_games_owned': 1234, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 641, 'last_played': 1518473727}
review:
Worms Clan Wars is another game at the famous franchise Worms. Like its predecessors, you'll create your team of worms and battle against other teams with an arsenal of weapons. However, this game has some changes from the previous versions and that's why is worth a shot.

[h1] Graphics[/h1] 
The graphics didn't change too much from the previous games. Th enviroment and the characters and colorful and lively, being nice to the eyes. 

[h1] Gameplay[/h1] 
The gameplay is the same of previous Worms: each player has your own turn and you choose one of your worms to do the action. You can move with the directional buttons, choose a weapon through your mouse or keyboard shortcuts and press the spacebar key to use the weapon. Depending of the weapon you choose, the effects at the opponent (and yourself) will be different, so you need to be cautious to not blown yourself up when you use the weapon. This is one of the many great things about the worms games, because a wrong use of a weapon can lead to very funny moments and even make you lose, instead of your opponent. When you use a weapon, your turn is over and it's your opponent turn. You win when every worm of your opponent is dead. If every worm, even yours, die, it will be a draw.

Also, you can also use some items which help you to fight or get a better position to knock out your enemy and, different of when you use a weapon, you won't finish your turn when using it. For example, with the ninja rope, your worm can reach high places and even shoot at your opponent while escaping for your own safety. For example, you can use the ninja rope to go higher and throw a dinamite at your opponent and, before the dynamite blows (you have only a couple of seconds), you can reach another safe place and watch your opponent getting blasted. Your opponent will be damaged by the explosion and be throw at the air because of the explosion and even can fall at the water, losing all its hp. By the way, there's water and you lose your worm if you fall there. Oops, didn't I say that before?

Anyway, it's really nice the huge variety of weapons for you to use at Worms Clan Wars. Plus, some of them are funny, like the powerful "Concrete Donkey", which, when used, a giant concrete donkey falls from the sky and go stomping every place at a vertical line, while doing a funny donkey sound.

By the way, I said before this game has some changes from its previous games. Well, this time, your worms are not equal. At previous games, every worm is exactly the same, changing only its name, but at this game, there are 4 types of worms, which can add some deep to your strategy. For example, there is the tiny worm, called "Scout", which can be faster and jump higher, but they are weaker than the another ones. In another hand, there's the "Heavy", which is the totally opposite of the Scout: it is fat and heavy, so it'll be slow and jump really low, but it's more powerful than the other ones. 

[h1] Audio & Soundtrack[/h1] 
There's not many musics here, but the few remaining are nice to hear. But the Audio and sound effects are great! They are nice and funny, specially the many voices you can use as your worms voice. You can laugh a lot with these.

[h1]Storyline[/h1] 
Worms usually has no fixed storyline, except this one has a campaign mode about some worms hunting some rare artifacts. But you don't need to do the campaign, if you prefer only fighting to the death against your friends or the AI or both.

[h1]The veredict[/h1]
It's another amazing Worms game, with some good improvements, but keeping the old and good formula of success that made Worms a loved franchise. If you love Worms games, don't miss this one. And if you never played a worms game, try this one! It's lovely and I think you will enjoy!

[h1]Rating:[/h1]
Graphics: 8/10
Audio: 10/10
Gameplay: 9,5/10
Overall: 9/10

review: I honestly loved the franchise, and played most of it. The game created a whole new genre, and didn't give a chance to any rivals to compete. This game, though, I feel like it's missing the soul of Worms. It limited many options which customized weaponry, and the amount you want for battle. Another thing is, the online system seems a bit unfair, and needs to balance it so that the person who gets the first turn is at a bit of a disadvantage because the players with the later turns can get teamed up upon, and just thrown off cliffs into water. Don't get me wrong, the game still kept many of the qualities, and is still fun to play with friends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042485131', 'num_games_owned': 1215, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1484546467}
review:
Sigh, you most likely already know what worms is about, it's one of the most well known video game series, and it is the essential party game. For the antisocial people that live under a rock (no offence though), Worms are creatures that have a long cylindrical tube-like body and no limbs. Worms the video game series is about teams of those creatures killing other teams of those creatures in a turn based format, sometimes with usual weapons, like an Uzi, and sometimes with a CONCRETE DONKEY.
But really, it is a very simple game, that's probably the reason why it's so popular, it's incredibly easy to just pick it up and play, and 18 years and 60 million copies sold later, the worms formula has been basically perfected.

Now, the worms games have been heavily criticised for publishing new games without much new content, and I completely agree, and this game also follows the same format, it's still the old 2D, worm killing, psychopath game we all love. But it also add some new content, I know, weird right?
This game has 3D graphics, the whole terrain, items, worms and weapons are fully modeled and rendered in 3D, even though the gameplay is in 2D. Also, it adds a single player campaign, now, I usually dislike having a single player campaign just for the sake of it, but in this game I feel like it is it's highlight, the story is really quirky and funny, and the narration by the psychopathic Crypt Creeper Tara Pinkle is just wonderful and really funny, one of the best parts of the game. The game also has an extensive character and terrain editor, with steam workshop compatibility, making it really fun to customize your game. And finally, the game has extensive additions to online multiplayer, there's a Clan option, allowing you to create a team up to 8 players and face off against other clans, and ranked mode, for both player vs player and clan vs clan, a clash of clans, if you will.

This game also looks really good, the 3D models and textures are really well done, and the game looks gorgeous, the 3D graphics are a step in the right mine-filled direction. And as I previously mentioned, the game has Steam Workshop compatibility, and it allows for some really funny and creative worms, like one that says Terry Crew's lines from the insane Old Spice commercials.
Also it has a very User-friendly interface, it's easy to figure out what each weapon does, the help menu is extensive, and the game has a great controller support. Also steam achievements and cards.

Overall, this game more than just more of the same, but it still is basically more of the same, so if you don't yet own a Worms game, this is undoubtedly the one for you, but if you already own one, the only real reason to get this one is Tara's spectacular voice acting.

Read more video game reviews at cassus.org

author: {'steamid': '76561198052077426', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1480182522}
review:
I used to play Worms armageddon when I was young and enjoyed it A LOT.
Today I played Worms Clan Wars for the first time with a friend (online). 

between each turn we had to wait SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO long before we could actually do something.
Also the game felt a lot less fun thatn world party and armageddon...

I rate 3/10 - would not recommend!
Go buy one of the classics, even the art looks better...

author: {'steamid': '76561198200013267', 'num_games_owned': 150, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 595, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1480204720}
review:
I really don't like the checkpoint in the game, which will end your turn immediately once you touch it. The check point is something should be helping players, but in this case it becomes something I am trying my best to avoid touching--more like a trap than checkpoint. 

The Ninja Rope in this game is bad as well. Comparing to Reloaded (the only other worms game I played, it is also the reason why I bought Clan War), it is much worse. You have no way to control your rope if you touch the wall, but in Reloaded you can bouce off the wall, which made it possible to go from place to place using rope.

author: {'steamid': '76561198309561803', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1585359388}
review:
The gameplay itself is ok but the graphics lack the clarity of earlier versions.  I found it hard to tell what was scenery and what was part of the game.  It looks very unappealing.

The AI is utterly dumb so the only challenge is navigating the maps and solving the puzzles.  It's also very CPU-intensive - it will sit there heating-up the CPU and turning-on the fans only to throw a grenade on itself.

I found the unskippable cut-scenes/intros very annoying, especially when you're replaying a level you lost.

I have only played story mode so far.

review:
An awfal entry to the Worms series.
The bassic issue i have agains this game is the 2.5D engine. So many bugs and so many frame drops that it's almost impossible to enjoy the game itself. If only i could count the worms died to me due to some stupid bug or unpredicted behaviour of the pyshics that it's just ridiculous.
Even if you're a Worms fan, do yourself a favour and skip this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011763519', 'num_games_owned': 5005, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 2469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 892, 'last_played': 1542205299}
review:
[i]Team 17 needs a new franchise. Hopefully they do overcooked 2.[/i] It's worms, the seminal 2d artillery game. I suppose at this point this is the worms game to get, it ticks all the boxes EDIT - now obseleted by worms WMD. It's got some weird "museum" theme happening in the metagame, doesn't add to the experience however. Hard to get excited about this given the similarity to the last worms game. And the one before that. And the one before that. And the one before that.

[h1] Good [/h1]
- it's the worms you know and love
- it's nicely balanced 
- plenty of content
- online play mostly works well

[h1] Bad [/h1]
- same ♥♥♥♥ different game
- clunky ♥♥♥ interface

Recommended I guess  [h1] 4/5 [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198120356999', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 172, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1487384163}
review:
暂时没钱买最新的，先买个13年的玩玩
还是经典的武器，经典的回合制，经典的自杀
游戏机制和10年前我小学玩的似乎没两样
感觉除了画质这10年似乎没变过：）
哦，想起小学的时候，还玩过一个3D版本的，当时我挺喜欢的，但周围人都评价不高，可能觉得违背了经典吧
所以可能后来百战天虫都这个套路了，最近玩过Ipad版本的也没太大变化
不过也好吧，经典就是经典
PS: 跟人对战和以前的单机是完全不同的感觉哦，高手判断风向什么的简直神操作
PS中的PS：据说最新的那个版本有坦克飞机什么的，终于不是那个哈雷路亚炸弹最王道了＝＝

author: {'steamid': '76561198090231466', 'num_games_owned': 1724, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1045, 'last_played': 1623610781}
review:
Ich mag das Spiel.
Allerdings macht es wahrscheinlich nur Spaß, wenn man es mit ein paar Freunden zusammen zockt, ansonsten geht der Spaßfaktor sehr schnell verloren.
Ich für meinen Teil habe schon sehr viele lustige Momente mit meinen Kumpels erlebt, Fails sind passiert und oft musste man wegen Bugs/Glitches im Spiel oder der eigenen Inkompetenz ausrasten.
Das Wasser ist in diesem Worms-Teil aufjedenfall um einiges besser als bei Revolution^^

Um euch nun einen kleinen Endruck von dem Spiel nahezulegen, empfehle ich, mal kurz in unsere Worms-Playlist reinzuschauen, in der viele lustige Videos von diesem Spiel aufgelistet sind: 
[url=https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_vJI7dmaDaF3cZNUu6e5Rxiyo8_UCckn]Eigenwerbung STINKT :D[/url] 


Insgesamt ist es ein mehr als durchschnittliches Spiel, welches aufjedenfall ein Muss für Worms-Fans ist und ein nettes Gelegenheitsspiel mit Freunden für Casual-Spieler ist. Knapp 20€ sind dafür auf keinen Fall zu viel verlangt!

author: {'steamid': '76561197980647320', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 336, 'last_played': 1472134837}
review: Não recomendo esse jogo, assim como também não recomendo o Worms Revolution pelo mesmo motivo: a atmosfera do jogo está pesada demais, a gravidade também. Mirar e atirar como fazíamos no Worms 2, Worms Armageddon e no Worms Reloaded não é a mesma coisa nem no Revolution e nem no Clan Wars. A física do meio ambiente não ficou legal. Não tive a menor paciência pra terminar nenhum dos dois jogos que mencionei. Rasguei dinheiro com a compra do Clan Wars e Revolution, principalmente pelo fato de ser raro encontrar alguém online pra jogar...

author: {'steamid': '76561198042669538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 750, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 750, 'last_played': 1470006339}
review:
First of all a disclaimer: I've never played any of the other Worms titles, I'm a total newbie at this so you won't find any comparisons in this review, which seems to be quite unusual judging by most other reviews. I'm also on a deadline to write this and it's a large game so I haven't completed the campaign like I usually do before a review, but I've played enough to make a judgement I think.

This is a game that can be placed into 2 genres: puzzle platformer (single-player) and competitive/strategy (online multi-player).

[b]Story mode[/b] has bucketloads of charm and humour in keeping with the whole theme of the game. You progress along the main map and each level has an intro telling the story, explaining the objective and telling you to kill the enemy worms (in ever inventive language). You have a team of 4 worms, each with individual characteristics - big/slow with more powerful explosions or small/fast with less damage, and various other traits. Some levels you control all 4 and on some parts of the map they split up so you only have one or two. To complete levels you have to reach objectives by collecting weapons and killing enemy worms along the way. Some weapons are carried over to the next level, others have a limited number of uses, there are always variations in line with the puzzle element of the level. Some levels are an all-out turn-based battle, 60 seconds per turn in the levels I've played so far. In all cases, shooting at the enemy ends your turn. They have points values, some more than others, and if you only wound them then they get to shoot back at you and that's mainly how you can end up failing the level - there are other hazards too like machine guns, landmines etc.

[b]Worm Ops[/b] is more or less a tutorial with a single worm and a different weapon on each level to kill the enemy worms without any other objectives. The trickiest thing to learn is how much power to apply to your ranged weapons so they arc through the air accurately to hit the enemies. I suspect this is a key skill for experienced players but I still haven't got the hang of it, the enemy worms are much better at it than I am at this point.

[b]Multiplayer:[/b] my first foray was a "partial success", as they used to say on the Fast Show. I made several attempts to join matches but kept being rejected, perhaps because of my Beginner status. After a couple of hours I eventually I managed to join a game with two other players. It took so long to load I thought it was stuck and almost quit, then eventually the terrain appeared but one player immediately dropped out, or maybe failed to connect. The in-game chat didn't work for me so I couldn't reply to the other player, we took a couple of turns (during which I probably embarrassed myself) then he decided to quit so I won by default, whereupon the game [b]CRASHED[/b]. I think I'll need a lot more experience before trying to compete anyway, I was overwhelmed with a full array of weapons choices having only encountered a limited number of them so far during my single-player campaign, so I would have been dead meat in short order had the game progressed any further.

[h1]Pros[/h1]

[b]Katherine Parkinson's voiceover[/b] (she's the TV actress best known as Jen in The IT Crowd comedy). [b]Oh My. God.[/b] I could listen to her all day long anyway, but there's not another voice on the planet that could improve this particular game. Inspired choice.

[b]Aesthetics:[/b] crisp, detailed cartoony graphics and wonderful animations - the way they go flying through the air from explosions is perfect - with cute squeaky voices and funny little comments. The background music is happy tunes that match the level themes, all very pleasant.

[b]Customisation:[/b] you can rename your worms and there are many options for worm appearance (eg. moustaches, hats, comical specs), worm accents/phrases (eg. Angry Scot, Hostage, Wise Guy), level appearance etc. and as if there wasn't enough already you can download/create even more content with the workshop editor tool.

[b]Level overview:[/b] you can zoom in and out and mouse over the whole level to plan your strategy, spot enemies and places to hide etc.

[b]Overall quality:[/b] very slick and polished, charm and humour, loads of content, cross-platform.

[b]Performance:[/b] I have an i7, 8Gb RAM and midrange graphics (nVidia Geoforce GTX 550 Ti) and I had all video settings maxed. The offline gameplay is very smooth, no glitches. I've seen others complaining about framerates when there's a lot of activity on the screen but I haven't advanced far enough to experience that level of action yet so I can't comment on it. The online multiplayer is another matter.

[b]Value:[/b] after 12 hours I'm barely halfway through Story mode and the levels are already becoming pretty difficult, I'm having to make more and more attempts to get through. After that I can replay to improve my scores and climb the leaderboards which are based on time taken to complete levels. So all in all excellent value even without taking multiplayer into consideration.

[h1]Cons[/h1]

[b]No Linux controller support.[/b] This was a big disappointment for me and it's not mentioned anywhere on the store page. People have said that it doesn't work well with a controller anyway but I disagree, I tried it and it felt much more efficient and natural. However, no offence to Win users but for me playing games in Windows is like trying to enjoy a nice meal in an overcrowded, smoke-filled cafe surrounded by festering armpits and screaming, puking babies. I'll take the keyboard in Linux, thanks.

[b]Multiplayer:[/b] there's a full built-in system for finding individual matches and managing clans, both of which have leaderboards, so all the infrastructure is there. However, my experience of it was not ideal so if it's mainly multiplayer you're interested in then perhaps this one isn't for you. Personally I prefer the single-player campaigns anyway, I'm a puzzler at heart.

[b]Strange default keyboard hotkeys[/b] but a) you get used to them after a while and b) you can change them.

[b]Hidden game mechanic:[/b] telekinesis requires the tab key to turn the object. This is not explained anywhere, either in-game or on Google. I discovered it by trial and error. You're welcome.

[h1]Verdict[/h1]

A fun, highly polished game with tons of content and a good learning curve. The Story mode will give you many hours of platform puzzling and then you can hone your strategic skills in online competition with your customised worms. It's not a cheap game but still good value for the quality and amount of content.

[quote][i]This review is part of the Steamified Community Review program. For similar reviews and fantastic giveaways please visit [url]http://steamified.com[/url].[/i][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561197981769493', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1256, 'last_played': 1469022340}
review:
Overall it is a nice game but the optimization ruins the experience. Which is quite a suprise since you expect a game that has min. HD 4650/ 8600 GT would run well on cards that are way better. Nope on HD 6770 at absolute low/off in 1280x720 the game was barely i repeat barely playable, you need at least something of GTX 750 ti to have decent framerate on high settings. 

So my recommendation is no as in HEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLL NNNNNNNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198063175694', 'num_games_owned': 792, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1467984208}
review:
Dear Team17, 
why are you still trying to fail in making a great game better with 3D and the exactly same gameplay. The low poly Landscapes feel boring, even with high settings the edges are unsharp, the music makes you fall asleep and the textures look like a 500% zoom onto some picture.

Can't you just try to add some gamemodes, worlds with physics and destruction or funny new weapons into some new worms game with a sharp and clear graphics style? I cannot see any reason to recommend this game and will never buy any new Worms as long as it is as boring as this one.


Anyway the idea of having a Macro-World in a Museum is great at least and the FX (even if they don't match the graphic style of the rest of the game) are nice, too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084889072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 721, 'last_played': 1467177235}
review: great fun, I've cried from laughing while playing this and I HONESTLY thought I was playing for like 3 hours.... but it was 8.1 in one sitting because i have no friends. At first I wasn't a big fan because I played the classic worms on the older consoles, but the game grew so much on me super fast, play the game as it is, then make game modes with stipulations and play with friends. Only thing I didn't like AT FIRST (meaning I do like it now) was the class based worms but they're not that hard to comprehend. Fat worm with more health more damage, small worm faster doesnt activate mines, genius worm heals and does genius shit, and the default worm. Mindless violence, and strategic gameplay, probably good for anybody 12 and up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069827942', 'num_games_owned': 505, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1475342175}
review:
Bardzo dobra kontynuacja wormsów 2D.
Działa na każdym systemie. Zero zwiechy.
Można grać na 1 pc, albo przez internet na multi player, bądź w coopa na kilku kompach.
Mnóstwo ciekawych broni. Kilkanaście nowych.Fajny edytor map. 
W którym każdy może stworzyć jakąś mapke i wgrać jeśli chce na workshop w steam. 
Dzięki czemu gra nie będzie się nudziła.
No i 0 płatnych DLC. Także na plus dodawania więcej niż 4 robaków do grópy.
To wydłuży daną rozgrywkę o kilkanaście kolejnych minut.

Please make worms armagedon HD and add for linux native. 
When worms armagedon hd add to steam and linux.
There is a lot of takers for this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062131902', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2986, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1500, 'last_played': 1658421729}
review:
Genialna, lecz prosta gra Co-Operacyjna razem z trybem dla jednego gracza zazwyczaj kupująca ze względu na tryb Multiplayer. Jednak fabuła nie jest aż taka zła, jak się wydaję. Gra jest świetnie zrobiona, polegająca na zneutralizowaniu wszystkich robali wroga najróżniejszymi sposobami, od słabych wierteł i granatów, po deszcz meteorytów.
Ogromną wadą gry jest brak aktualizacji dodających więcej możliwości w trybie Multiplayer. Po dziesiątkach godzin na takich zasadach jest bardzo prawdopodobne, że gra się znudzi. Jednak dobra zabawa ze znajomymi opóźnia znudzenie gwałtownie,
Solidne 8/10 za tryb Multiplayer, oraz 3/10 za przykrą, lecz znośną fabułę.
Według mnie gra ta jest warta polecenia jak macie z kim grać :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198126022752', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 8637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7661, 'last_played': 1658587986}
review:
I don't know why recent reviews are mixed 

This game is a great party of fun with friends, either you want to compete and win the match or just chill and laugh a lot.
It has good graphics, a variety of weapons and a level editor. I don't use the online play of this game a lot i only play with friends but i think it's a bit bugged.
So if you want to have a good time playing a game with your friends i would definitely recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198170787571', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1471174733}
review:
How can they keep getting it so wrong?

Before you even begin the game you're assaulted with the worst menu imaginable. It's a mess of clicking back and forth. So many clicks to access options that should be in one place. Basic UI design, or even testing the usuability should have addressed these issues. Why does each succesive Worms game have a worse and worse UI? It's been downhill since Worms 2. Like our thumbs have been growing non stop since the nineties. It looks like it's made for a touch screen interface, and probably was. PC versions should have PC interfaces.

I'm so vexxed about the UI I don't really even want to talk about the game. Back to Worms Armageddon!

author: {'steamid': '76561198144416390', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1628776843}
review:
Worms Clan Wars Kolejna z odsłon legendarnej serii Worms, koncentrująca się w szczególności na sieciowych pojedynkach dwóch drużyn graczy. Twórcy z firmy Team 17 zdecydowali się połączyć klasyczne mechanizmy rozgrywki z elementami współczesnych gier wieloosobowych oraz tytułów spod znaku MOBA. W grze powraca znany z Worms Revolution system klas robali, który na potrzeby produkcji sieciowych został solidnie rozbudowany. Poszczególne typy robaków zostały bowiem bardziej zróżnicowane, a ich specjalizacje mają teraz znacznie większy wpływ na przebieg potyczki. Znacząco usprawniono także silnik fizyczny oraz algorytmy sterujące zachowaniem przedmiotów i wody. Rozgrywka wzbogacona została dodatkowo rozbudowanymi opcjami społecznościowymi. Każdy z sieciowych klanów może liczyć początkowo 8 graczy, a kolejne zmagania podzielone zostały na sezony, których wyniki decydują o pozycji poszczególnych klanów w rankingu. Dla tradycjonalistów, w grze przewidziano także obszerną kampanię single player.


OCENA 9/10

review:
The game looks visually atrocious with jagged edges around everything, I'm not normally the kind of person to complain about graphics, but the game just looks bad, even with anti-aliasing turned on, the game also runs at a terrible frame rate (generally hovering around 20fps) on a PC that easily meets the minimum required specs.

I am a huge fan of the Worms series but I unfortunately cannot recommend this game whatsoever due to the horrific visual problems this game has.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077538197', 'num_games_owned': 317, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 1826, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1826, 'last_played': 1462052308}
review:
I don't understand how this awesome franchise went as down for their two last games.

First of all Clan Wars & Revolution are the exact same games! A real copy and past, even for the shitty bugs!

One of my favorite tool was the rope cause you could do really funny things with it, now you get stuck all the time and die because of that...
Ho yes, now you have the water! Yeah.. The water... Well this feature is to-ta-lly useless...

The 3D graphics did make sense in worms 3D, but in here there is absolutely no point to use it..

The bots are completely useless! I don't know how many turn I have waited 45sec to see the AI doing nothing at all!

The games modes are seen and seen again and again. Nothing really new.
They could have create new vs games with this awesome feature (the water) but I think they realized how shitty it was and did nothing with it...

Ho, and about the controls on a controller. Even this is totally wrong! The buttons mapping is totally TOTALLY NOT intuitive! I mean, jump with A? A?!! And fire with X? X?!!! That's the best way to mislead everyone!

The only good point is the story and the voice acting. It seams they spent all their money in it....


Anyway, I'm so disappointed with those games, I really miss the previous worms...
It a shame cause I really like this franchise, I have so many memories playing with friends. But recently it not fun anymore. It just kinda fun mixed with gameplay bugs & annoyance...

author: {'steamid': '76561198111053965', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2391, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 372, 'last_played': 1706964825}
review:
Bardzo dobra, kolejna edycja gry z serii Worms.
Bardzo duży plus za dodanie do produktu rankingów i tzw. rankingowych meczy online. Zapoczątkowaniem tych jakże świetnych ulepszeń było wprowadzenie tytułowych klanów które oczywiście świetnie odgrywają swoją rolę. Niestety serwery dedykowane tej grze są wprost tragiczne gdyż nawet podczas zwykłej gry z kolegami gra często miewa utraty połączenia itp. Grafika i animacje w przeciwieństwie do serwerów wprost powalają z nóg. Gdy gracz posiada dobry sprzęt jest w stanie to odczuć. Oczywiście jest też klimat starych Worms'ów za co też plus. Ocena to mocne 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165561778', 'num_games_owned': 451, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 1188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1188, 'last_played': 1458211134}
review:
If you remember playing Worms years ago and thought that this is the new improved version with much better graphics and much more features you might be disappointed. It is rather fine but the weird multiplayer lobby makes it hard to get any opponents online unless you friend people who frequently play multiplayer matches.

The graphics are somewhat hideous, with blobs imitating water and 3d-ish models that lokk outdated.

The mechanics are so-so. The ninja rope is prone to blocking constantly, but other than that the combat is okay. 

Would I recommend this game? Yes, it's a fun part of the Worms series. There's a ton of weapons to choose from and a lot of customisation. The single player/tutorial part is rather short, but the story part long and fairly challenging.

Is it what I was expecting of it? Not even close. 

5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198011551145', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 834, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1691244016}
review:
Я обожаю франшизу про червячков, но прошлая игра меня ОЧЕНЬ разочаровала... своими нововведениями по типу классов червей или бесполезного желе. изменилось ли, ситуация к этой игре? НЕТ!
Здесь есть конечно плюсы по типу увлекательных миссий в компании, но это не делает игру хороший ибо все осталось на том же уровне, УЖАСНЫЙ визуальный стиль, беспонтовые классы и желе.
Если вам понравилась прошлая часть игры то покупайте, но если нет то я ее вам не рекомендую.

review:
-Multiplayer'da hayaletler dolaşıyor 1 tane bile oyun olmaz mı? Arada 1 tane buluyor onda da millet hazır demiyor :D
-Optimizasyon berbat pc ne kadar iyi olursa olsun pürüzlü çalışıyor.
-Ah şu ip Armageddon'daki gibi olsa keşke.
-SinglePlayer görevleri aptalca olmuş.Yürü yürü, solucanı öldür kapı açılsın, o kapıdan geç sonra yine bir solucan öldür diğer kapı açılsın.
-Aptalca bir hikaye ve saçma espiriler.
Şu güzelim seriyi berbat ettiler bir de adamlar çok agresif.Mesela fb sayfalarına yapıcı eleştirilerde bulundum adamlar hemen sayfaya yazı yazmamı engellemiş.Demem o ki indirimdeyken bile alınmaz zaten multiplayer oynayamıyorsun adam yok tek Single için almak da çok mantıksız.

review:
[Worms Clan Wars]
Ocena: 10/10
---------------------------------------------
Nie ma co oceniać po prostu wormsy. Świetnie wykonana gra ze świetną grafiką znakomitą grywalnością , ciekawym multi oraz wciągającą i zarazem zabawną fabułą misji offline . Polecam każdemu fanowi serii Worms studia Team17. 
Moim skromnym zdaniem gra bardzo przypomina jedne z pierwszych wormsów (tych 2D które miały świetną grywalność).

SZCZERZE POLECAM !!! 
Nie ma sensu wypisywać plusów i minusów bo gra jest poprostu dopracowana w każdym calu.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972297308', 'num_games_owned': 4440, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 850, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 850, 'last_played': 1456146067}
review:
I was playing Worms Clan Wars around the same time as I was playing Worms Revolution, so I will mainly compare this game to that one.

[b]Worms Clan Wars has:[/b]
- [b]Fewer (and easier) single player missions.[/b]
- [b]Worse AI.[/b] The enemy worms kill themselves half the time. Some people were complaining that the AI in Worms Revolution was way too skilled, but I'd prefer that over this idiot AI any time.
- [b]More annoying (and less funny) narrator[/b], although this probably is a matter of taste.
- [b]Game-breaking bugs.[/b] Some levels can't be completed and you have to do them all over again from the start, possibly even multiple times until you figure out what causes the bug.
- [b]Crashes.[/b]
- [b]A higher price.[/b]

Overall:
Don't buy this game unless you have already finished Worms Revolution and just want to do some more single player missions (that you might have to redo several times).

its a good game with great new perks, its simular to the classic worms which i like, Also you have the choice to make/join a clan, However even tho this is probably the best worms game to buy and play on single player .

However it can be extremely difficult to find a online game, Luckily i have a few mates who own the game as well so we can play multiplayer games whenever we like.

New features include water bombs and a few other water weapons which i really enjoy using as i flood the shit out of the map making worms meet their makers

author: {'steamid': '76561198018640959', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 12869, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2061, 'last_played': 1488656608}
review:
Es ist und bleibt eines der besten Spiele wenn man sich einfach mal die Zeit vertreiben will! Das erste mal spielte ich Worms Armagedon in jungen Jahren. Bis hier hin haben sich viele Dinge verändert und ich hätte auch noch ein paar Verbesserungsvorschläge, wenn es zum Beispiel ums Spielsetup handelt. Ich bemängele auch die mickrigen einstellungen was das Clan Wars Web Portal betrift, z.B. das man keinen Clan suchen kann indem man den Namen eingibt. Außerdem habe ich dem mittlerweile schon einem Monat wo ich das Spiel habe nie ein Teammitglied gesehen. Ich denke es ist nicht gut einen Verdienst auszuschreiben für eine Sache die später keiner nutzt. Man muss ja auch kritisch sein. Trotzdem sage ich das es mein Lieblingsspiel ist. Damals waren es mal die Silver Games Editionen oder golden Games Editionen, heute spiele ich auf Steam. Also mir gefällts, fairer Preis und einigermaßen kurze Wartezeiten...
See you in Worms, Servus!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198109846895', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 636, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1460495099}
review:
Kaum anders als jedes andere Worms und trotzdem vollpreis. Ein einfaches DLC für ein paar Euro würden auch reichen, aber wir wollen ja nicht das Sims 3 System haben.

Trotz dass wenige Veränderungen geboten werden macht das Spiel natürlich immernoch vorallem mit Freunden im Multiplayer extrem Spaß. Das neu hinzugefügte Clan System und die Freischaltung aller Wurmklassen ohne den Singleplayer spielen zu müssen machen Clan wars zu einem Spiel, das besser für den Multiplayer geeignet ist. Kaufempfehlung

Servers r a bit laggy but nothing serious fortunately!

Overall 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198080800104', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 1354, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1354, 'last_played': 1438557905}
review:
Você que esta lendo minha analise pode não concordar com alguns critérios, mas só pela questão de estar lendo já fico contente...

Minhas analises são baseadas em critérios abaixo:

- Dificuldade: 7.0

- Diversão: 7.0

- Gráfico: 8.0

- Historia: 0.0

- Jogabilidade: 8.0

Nota Final: 6.0

Recomendação: Bom para passar o tempo.

 Lembrando que "Jogos nem sempre precisa de gráficos para se tornar fantásticos."

author: {'steamid': '76561198083220846', 'num_games_owned': 224, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 933, 'last_played': 1528638593}
review:
Worms Clan Wars is a really great game to play with friends, the integration of the Steam Workshop means that it's more hilarious than ever. Over the week that I've had it I've already racked up 14 hours on this game and counting. I'd really recommend it if you're a casual player or you just want to mess around with friends. It's not amazingly optimised truth be told but it makes up for it with a Campaign that teaches you about all those weapons you never really knew what the hell they did. 

If you're on the fence, I'd say go for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980058119', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1451753589}
review:
Ziemlich enttäuschend. Ich hatte gehofft ein gutes "altes" Wormsspiel zu bekommen, aber was hier geliefert wurde ist eher mit "naja, eher net so geil", zu beschreiben. 
Das Wormsfeeling ist da, das ist ein guter Punkt.
Was mich jedoch stört ist:
- Bei einigen Karten ists sehr schwer zu erkennen was Background ist und was nicht (zumindest als blutiger Anfänger)
- Hitboxen: Ich finds schrecklich, wie die Würmer an Kanten hängen- bzw. Steckenbleiben. Das Ninjaseil war damals (Worms 2 und Armageddon) sau geil, jetzt ists ne Qual, damit gescheit zu schwingen und zu arbeiten.
- Bugs: Sorry wenn ein Objekt auf einen fällt und mal keinen DMG macht oder manchmal bugy zuckelt und solange auf den Wurm fällt, bis er tot ist, ist das ein no go!

Ein schlechter Wormsteil, diese Steuerung und Hitboxen gehen mir richtig auf die Nerven. Es fühlt sich nicht rund an und kommt mir vor, als wenn man schnell ein 0 8 15 Game geschustert hat, statt sich Mühe zu geben um einen tollen Titel zu erstellen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068213254', 'num_games_owned': 257, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1613, 'last_played': 1709318176}
review:
Ein Multiplayerspiel was seines gleichen sucht. Was in Mariokart blaue Panzer sind, sind in Worms bananabombs und esel und holygrenades und superschafe und und und... Na gut an die Steuerung muss vorerst gewöhnen und eigentlich bassiert das spiel zu 90% auf Glück. Trotzdem macht es mit ein paar Freunden Riesen Spaß und man hat immer Zeit für ne kleine partie. 
Das Beste: Man kann wie in alten Zeiten zu viert an einem Pc daddeln und erlebt die wutausbrüche wenn ein armagedon einschlägt live zuhause :D
8,5/10   Was kann man da für den Preis falsch machen?? Vorallen wenn man in der theorie nur ein Spiel für 4 Personen braucht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026153557', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 569, 'last_played': 1509109662}
review:
Worms Clan Wars to przyjemna gra w którą można pograć z grupą przyjaciół.

Rywalizacja między znajomymi może przystworzyć dużo zabawy i nerwów z powodu nieudanych akcji które mogę przeważyć na losy wygranej rundy. Warsztat społecznościowy dużo wnosi do gry gdyż pojawiają się nowe ubranka dla naszego robaka. Mapy są generowane losowo przy czym możemy wygenerować mape do swojego stylu gry. 

PLUSY 
+ Świetny Multiplayer 
+ Dobra Rozgrywka 
+ Śmieszne dodatki z warsztatu społecznościowego które urozmaicają rozgrywkę. 
+ Oprawa dźwiękowa 
+ Wygląd Map 
+ Różnorodność Robaków 
+ System Klanowy ( Przecież to Clan Wars ) 
+ I wiele wiele innych 

MINUSY 
- Jet Pack na wodę może nieżle irytować ( Mały minus ) 
- Więcej minusów się nie dopatrzyłem i nie chcem na siłe szukać 

PODSUMOWANIE
= Warto kupić by pobawić się ze znajomymi ponieważ gra przysporzy dużo godzin dobrej zabawy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987893891', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1439149294}
review:
Nová reinkarnace nesmrtelných bojových červů. V singleplayeru lze hrát Versus: deathmatch, nebo pevnosti. Pevnosti znamená, že každý tým má svou oddělenou pevninu. V základu hry je 5 AI týmů. Maximálně můžou hrát až 4 hráči (PC nebo lidé). Dále lze hrát příběh, kde s jedním wormem procházíte různé světy, nebo několik samostatných misí. I zde se vyskytuje voda, jako v Revolution, v níž se wormové topí, nebo je od někud splachuje.
Multiplayer:
V multiplayeru byla v době mého testování (rok 2015) jen jedna hra, což je podivné, když uvážíme, že je to nejnovější díl série. Asi hráči hrají spíše starší Reloaded, nebo Revolution, když je to prakticky úplně to samé a neutrácí zbytečně za Clan Wars.
Plusy:
Opět je možnost si nastavit vzhled červů - já jim například vybral na hlavu fešné přilby Wehrmachtu. :) Opět nechybí i editor herního světa.
Mínusy:
Herní svět je opět kýčovitě nepřehledný. Není poznat, co je hrací plocha a co pozadí. Je to prakticky úplně stejné, jako předchozí díly a i já dlouho váhal, jestli to mám koupit. Nakonec se na Steamu naskytla výhodná slevička a já to nakonec přece jenom koupil.

author: {'steamid': '76561198182683579', 'num_games_owned': 520, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1470584613}
review:
Według mnie najlepsza do tej pory cześć worms'ów, przyjemnie się gra przez multiplayer, ależ i przyjemnie przechodzi się kampanie lub misje specjalne. Gra jest 2,5D rzadko spotykane. Czyli modele, scenografia itd. jest 3D a widok mamy 2D. W grze wprowadzono nowość, czyli jak w tytule gry "Clan Wars" wojny klanowe/rankingowe, szkoda tylko że mało osób teraz gra multi ;/ 
Jeśli chodzi o klasy naszych robali to mamy do wyboru: 
-Gruby = DMG 
-Naukowiec = +5hp co turę
-Strażnik = zwykły
-Skaut/zwiadowca = szybkość/zwinność/zręczność/mały dmg
W grze mamy wiele uzbrojenia po podstawowy granat czy bazuke po morderczy armagedon czy też kamienny osioł.
Bardzo polecam tę grę, moja ocena 10/10
Warto zagrać

author: {'steamid': '76561198150675310', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1450529170}
review:
Bought the game because I am a long-time fan of the Worms series.  I figured that a 2013 edition of the game would be bigger and better.  Boy was I mistaken.

My PC is a potato.  I recognize that.  But I can't understand how and why this game runs so poorly, particularly since the "3D" aspects of the game are quite tame.  Input lag.  Poor frame rates.  Terrible optimizations.  Even the cursor moves around on the selection menus with a delay, resulting in misclicks at every turn.  I get that I can't run the latest AAA titles, but thereis no excuse for how terribly this game runs.  This smacks of a terrible console port.

The new control configuration is also terrible.  I don't really understand what was wrong with the original control setup.  Someone decided to reinvent the wheel, and this new wheel does not roll.

This, like all other worms games that attempt to go 3D, is an unmitigated disaster.  Worms is best in 2D and IMO it should stay that way.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977087560', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1454273782}
review:
Team17 had recently a lot of downtime of their servers for Worms Clan Wars.
It was very frustrating not being able to start a mutliplayer match even all players were ready.
A few days later, everything works again and online multiplayer fights are fully functional.
So in case this happens again: yes it sucks, but give it some time, try some days later again, it's worth it.

Worms Clan Wars is a classical Worms-Game from Team17 like the early versions back in the childhood.
Still the cool old weapons like holy hand grenade, the Grandma Fart or the concrete donkey - but also plenty of new weapons.
Its awesome to play it with friends - Consider buying a cheap 4-pack of the game. More friends having a copy of the game - more fun. I would recommend to wait buying it until a sale with a good discount offers this game, because the standard price is way too much. 

All in all: Awesome game!
