author: {'steamid': '76561198055106792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1449416108}
review: Who even plays this Game? I mean i wait 1 hour to join a match but those people dont even click to make theirself green so its an forever going waiting process. The day i bought it, i thought its worth the 3 euro, but its not even 1 euro worth it.. Not worth my time. Just playing offline is boring as hell. The game is full of the polish force no wonder why we need to wait forever, dont want to be racist but i was not even once able to join a game since i bought this Game. I wonder why so many people enjoy this game. I personaly didnt enjoy any moment in this Game. The offline gameplay is just poorly and online like i said not working. Thank you whoever made this Game... Many People will say now:" then why did you buy it?" or " Why dont you refund?" I thought its a good game with competend people and i dont refund because the money i would get is just not worth my time. Dislike this review or whatever. This is my personal Review about this Game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098138406', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1449943507}
review: They tried to reinvent a classic with 3d graphics on a 2d game. And horribly failed. This is just Worm-3d-bad. The overall grafic effect is painful for my eyes and so unoptimized it's going to stress your CPU and you. Maybe you could get used to that but I uninstalled it and tagget it "Never More" in my library before this could happen. "Worms Reloaded" is nothing new but it works, if you love the classic game, go for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029023627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1449104526}
review:
Why did I buy Worms Clan Wars and not Worms Reloaded? This is so much worse... It's 3D, looks ugly, very laggy and slow on my laptop (even on LOW settings), although I can run, for example, Crysis WARHEAD perfectly fine :( It's so laggy that most of the time it processes double Shift (back flip) as single Shift (forward jump) and my worms simply jump into water. Can I replace this with much more classic-looking, 2D Worms Reloaded? :)
UPD: Oh, and did I mention that Worms World Party or Worms Armageddon are still the best? Hell, even Hedgewars is 10 times better than this (serioursly, try them out).

author: {'steamid': '76561198023619499', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1465061246}
review:
Game is awesome! I don't remember when I had so much fun and when I laughed soo haaard - funny situations, epic fails, funny kills.

I like idea of 4 classes of worms - each class has pros and cons.

Dynamic items or map (f.e. statue can be pushed or bally thing can be rolled, etc)

Soundtrack is very good, I am positive suprised.

One con is that multiplayer was broken for 2 days, but it's understardable - there was Humble Bundle and Steam Sale, servers just gone down - BUT devs reacted on forums and restarted WORMNET servers - so multiplayer IS WORKING there. I think they will restart quick unranked matches servers too, so it will be fixed. On Wormnet you can play unranked too, so don't worry :)

review: I absolutly love this game. It is much more fun with a group of friends than alone, but either way you will not regret this buy. I would play more if my friends would. The only down side is some of my friends rage quite from their mistakes if you and friends don't do that it will make the game that much more better. I actually think the best part of the game is the mistakes people and I make. They are so funny.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038136726', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1585491289}
review:
[strike]The multiplayer serves as a chat room.
YES , you're reading it right. A CHAT ROOM.
People come in the lobby..Everyone is ready...READY TO CHAT.
The game won't start.
We always end up talking about how we wasted our money on this game.

10 out of 10
Very nice chat room. Better than any other social media. Will invite more friends.[/strike]

EDIT: It's a miracle that the servers are working fine now. That means the game will start automatically when everyone is ready. Enjoy :-)

review:
Do not buy this game.
The developers have abandoned it, and it is mostly dead except for those who don't know how messed up and broken this game is. 

When you try to join a match against other players, there is no start button or process and the overall introductions are very confusing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052445044', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1448772498}
review: In Worms Reloaded you could have tons of different themes when creating your worms team. In this you have a few cosmetics that are just completely random and almost none fit any of the voices you an choose from. In this they have limited your creativity to "Random", now you can have a team of worms with scientist glasses and a divers helmet with the voice of a "cheese". Congratz.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197992752428', 'num_games_owned': 2145, 'num_reviews': 179, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1648319975}
review:
Un peu déçu de cet opus, l'évaluation faite suite à un crash en pleine checkpoint qui m'a fait perdre l'avancement dans la campagne (2 heures de jeu) cela n'aguère rien de bon sur la technnique. 
On va commencer par cette dernière, sachant que la première fois que j'ai joué à la plupart des jeux de la série, sauf les dérivés qui ne m'ont jamais intéressés. Depuis le passage à la 3D les missions sont devenues beaucoup simple et avec un scénario plus poussé qui donne envie d'aller jusqu'au bout. 

En terme de jouabilité, il n'apporte pas grand chose par rapport à Revolution qui a été comme le premier épisode en 3D une claque en terme de changement avec les différentes classes de soldat, la gestion des fluides, par contre l'accès au workshop est un petit plus. 

Graphquement le jeu n'est pas mauvais, par contre l'érgonomie est désastreuse, le multijoueur est vide du fait que Team17 transforme en Call of Worms Creed avec un épisode au moins par an. 

Par contre essayez Hedgewars c'est un clone libre de Worms qui est particulièrement bien optimisé et très drôle à jouer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023766021', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 10821, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2544, 'last_played': 1676134483}
review:
Imagine if you loved marmite one day, then despised it the next, breaking all the rules. That's how Worms Clan Wars is for me.

On the one hand, the artistic maps with dynamic water provide a highly involving environment on which a remixed version of the classic worms gameplay can take place. Moving worms about with water - particularly small bodies of water released from high terrain, sweeping worms to their doom or at least discomfort - has proved very entertaining, much as it did in Worms Revolution. The weapons are exceedingly well balanced with just one major exception, though even that (the Concrete Donkey, of course) is more challenging to use now due to realistic interaction with the terrain. I'm impressed how tricky it is to make use of some of the most powerful weapons, for example it's rare to be able to get a lot out of the Old Woman unless on a very basic landscape with some long, gradually sloped or flat sections.

The darkside to the game involves somewhat dodgy physics when attempting to move about. For the most part, things are alright, but every now and then a worm will get caught on a small, pretty much invisible speck of land and this can ruin attempts to cross decent distances with a single jump or rope swing. Speaking of the rope, that really can be a nightmare, as for some reason it tends to get caught on bits of land very easily, forcing you to release and try another shot (if you have one). Not only that but it has a notoriously unreliable 'up and over' feature, which sees a worm that has pulled the rope all the way in to the land attempt to spring up from the rope to get into a ledge. It's about 50/50 whether the worm will make it or not, and if not - and this is the real troublemaker - the fact that the worm makes contact with land removes its ability to shoot out a new rope and save itself. All too often this results in a worm sliding into deep water or off the map entirely. Brilliant blow-by-blow standoffs have come to an unjust end as one player attempted to relocate just a short distance for a more strategic bazooka launching position.

Overall though, the game has entertained me enough to keep me coming back, despite a bit of lag due to the game's minimum requirements being a bit higher than the specs given in the store (trust me - I've tried turning all the options down to their lowest).

While I'm at this I may as well add that I feel the game would have greatly benefitted from the inclusion of a couple weapons in particular; the mail strike (a tactical wind-affected strike for which I always enjoy watching the different items of mail affect each others paths in Worms Armaggedon) and the Ming Vase (a cluster weapon dropped like dynamite that was good for blasting away several layers of land in W:A - making it a great tactical weapon despite being 'super'). This is, of course, a matter of personal opinion and does not affect the rating for this game that I am giving, which is:

7/10

So I do reccomend this game provided your PC/Laptop exceeds the minimum specs slightly (e.g. at least 4GB RAM) and/or you are willing to set the various game options to the minimum .

author: {'steamid': '76561197980514994', 'num_games_owned': 801, 'num_reviews': 139, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1449351985}
review:
Pros: 
Great fun. Many improvements over worms reloaded and the bugs from that game are not present. Interesting variety of weapons and the AI has been improved. Graphics have been improved too.  Lots of customization options.

You can choose between different worms to have in your team. Scientists for example heal nearby friendly worms, scouts can move faster and don't set off mines, soldiers make a huge explosion when they die, etc. This adds a bit more strategy.

Cons: 
Online multiplayer is deserted. I could not find a clan or a ranked online match with people. You will most likely need to play this with IRL friends. This is a multiplayer game!! 
There should have been more out-of-the-box variety in landscape art. 

Neutral: 
The music is only OK. It could be better.

Careful: 
This game may not have cross platform support.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051283774', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 2635, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1269, 'last_played': 1508963548}
review:
[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
Gameplay has improved since I last played a game of Worms, but the core gameplay is the same. Some weapons has been added into the game, but most of the classic weapons is still there. You are basically worms with weapons killing the other worms. The last worm alive wins. There is a good amount of strategy in the game, which makes it a fun and a challenging game. The multiplayer is quite excellent too. As the name suggest, you can now form clans to create the ultimate team. The game also features a singleplayer campaign, which is heavily underrated. There is also a lot of customization, you can change anything from how your worms speak, to what clothes they are wearing and a lot of maps in the workshops. 

[h1]Graphics[/h1]
The has been modernized enough to keep it classic for nolstagic fans as well as newcomers. Worms has always been a cute-killing game. There is also a lot of depth in the levels and interesting map design. Too bad they are not as memomable as the earlier games.

[h1]Sound[/h1]
All the guns sounds satisfying, especially the explosions. The voices the Worms makes when they die are hilarious too. 

[h1]Verdict[/h1]
Worms Clan Wars is an excellent party game, and with the brilliant multiplayer it makes it even more easy to pick up and play. [i]It is worms, guys! What else can I say?![/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198160433325', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1446671767}
review:
I have always had a soft spot for the Worm's series, which it's crazy physics, bazookas, dynamite, super sheep and holy hand grenades and this game hasn't changed that opinion one bit. I took advantage of the package deal and got this Worms game along with several others. Note this is a first impression review.

Worms Clan Wars is an 2.5D artillery game where you control teams of Worms to defeat the other teams. You use a wide selection of weaponry and tools to secure victory. Sometimes in hilarious ways. Gameplay wise this is no Armaggedon but it comes close.

Even when you lose or do something daft you can always laugh about it. In one case, I was going to do a classic tactic of using a baseball bat to send an enemy worm into the water, only instead for the worm to catch onto a piece of landscape, I was still laughing afterwards.

Unlike most Worms games including Armaggedon, you have several classes of Worms to use. The Soldier is basically the standard Worm, but gains the ability to detonate grenades at any time. The Scout is a weaker, but faster Worm that doesn't set of mines. The Heavy is a slow, but tough worm that does extra damage. The Scientist is similar to the Solider but can heal itself and its teammate each turn whilst producing better tools. You can configure your team to adapt to this.

Online Gameplay is fun, and even when something daft happens you can still enjoy it and the clan features are nice.

The only criticism I have is the modded in cosemtic options, which with some items like that Master Chief helmet can really cause the lag in an online game to go theough the roof and with a rather low spec computer it has firced me to quit several times.

Definately recommend giving this game a shot!

author: {'steamid': '76561198000914865', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 850, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 532, 'last_played': 1630900364}
review:
I was alive when the first Worms came out and this latest flavour is decent. I play it with a friend through Steam, which is very well integrated and quick to jump in.

If you are a fan of Worms games, this one will not dissappoint. It's still just Worms, but the game runs smoothly, the graphics are good, the silly comedy is still there and blowing you friends away in this game never gets old!

Only complaint, if at all, the price is a bit high, but get it on sale and you'll get a great value buy.

review: Qu'est ce qu'on pourrait avoir de plus ? Ce jeu offre un liberté absolument vaste à son utilisateur avec l'option de créer des clan qui permet de regroupper ses amis sous une seul équipe (c'est un peu marqué dans le nom du jeu en même temp), combattre des clans qui peuvent envoyer une demande de combat. A regréter peu etre le manque de libre arbitre sur le mode Histoire où l'on a plus des enigmes a résoudre qu'un vrai combat comme dans le mode histoire de Worms Revolution.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064867906', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1514526238}
review:
Meu eu realmente não custumo escrever analises mas esse jogo merece...

Mano eu tenho um pc muito bom comparado com a media e esse jogo consegue rodar com poucos fps??!?! O quanto eles suga de suas funções desncessarias.. Gostaria de relembrar e ter boas memorias com worms como tive com o primeiro da série que nunca esqueci onde várias vezes comprava CD's no mercado de worms que nunca funcionavam mas eu curtia tanto o game que eu não me importava de tentar.. Em fim totalmente desapontante tanto o game, os gráficos, os requisitos necessarios (ou melhor desnecessarios.. ) EM FIM.. Esse foi o fim dessa franquia para mim.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965940511', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 155, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1443854118}
review: Worms is in line with the previous games, a 2D team-based arcade arena, and their humour is par for the course, along with the weapons, stages, etc. Clan wars is a great little title to play with friends, the updated interface and 3D graphics are nicely done, customization is high, with mod support to boot, and I've gotten more than a couple laughs and good entertainment already. If you like dicking around with your friends with mayhem and well placed mechanics and overall gameplay, this works great. I'm not sure about solo, or the full price point at the moment, but I'd say worth a sale price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062439680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 418, 'last_played': 1497977347}
review:
miło było wrócić do wormsów, ale to niestety nie jest tak dobre jak world party :( 

+dobra oprawa graficzna
+fajne animacje broni
+ciekawy singleplayer
+system klanów

-masa błędów fizyki gry
-dziwne lagi
-słaba optymalizacja
-puste serwery gry
-wywala często z lobby
-oprawa audio jest poprostu niezachwycająca

20 zł to nie jest dobra cena za odgrzewany kotlet w dodatku dziwnie zaserwowany, wolę iść do kauflandu kupić wołowiny i zrobić dobrego burgera. gra 4/10 niepolecam niestety. na LAN party najlepszą wersją pozstaje armagodeon albo world party

review: Świetna gra. Polecam w szczególności fanom tej niezapomnianej z dzieciństwa gry :) Teraz jest w lepszej wersji graficznej i jest jeszcze ciekawsza i zabawniejsza :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198060701699', 'num_games_owned': 429, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1484422769}
review:
Worms Clan Wars to kontynuacja znanej serii robaczków. Jak każde Worms'y polega na wykończenia robaczków przeciwnika i przeżycie samemu. Gra jest przyjemna rozgrywka też. Można pograć ze znajomymi, jak i z nieznanymi graczami z całego świata. Mamy dużo map, kostiumów, broni i trybów do wybory, W grze są 4 rodzaje robaczków do wyboru. Jedyne wady produkcji to beznadziejna konfiguracja gry, żeby pograć na 100 FPS'ach trza mieć kompa za min. 5 tyś. Drugą wadą tej produkcji jest monotonność map, prawie wszystkie wyglądają tak samo. Polecam ludziom, którzy mają dobry sprzęt i są fanami robaczkowych wojen.

Grafika: 10/10 Ładna, luźna i przyjemna dla oka.

Audio: 10/10 Ładna muzyczka, a efekty dźwiękowe też fajne są.

Zabawa: 8/10 Lag'i lag'i i jeszcze raz lag'i, reszta nie przeszkadza w przyjemnej zabawie.

Multiplayer: 7/10 Połączenia zostają zerwane bardzo często, trzeba mieć dobrego i stabilnego neta, plus ludzie bywają totalnymi noob'ami, co czasem denerwuje.

Ocena ogólna: 7/10 Gdyby nie beznadziejna konfiguracja i lag'i na serwerach gry byłoby 10/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021500136', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 569, 'last_played': 1436999661}
review:
Clan Wars is probably the most innovative Worms game to date offering the same diversity of classes as Revolution albeit with some tweaks for balancing.

In case you're not familiar with them: 
[list]
[*] Soldiers are the same regular worms from all other games except they can choose when to detonate grenades. 
[*] Heavies have the most damage and biggest explosions but are slower and (obviously) heavier. 
[*] Scouts are more mobile with longer jumps and are light enough to avoid triggering mines but deal less damage.
[*] Scientists heal friendly worms in a small radius at the start of their turn and all constructions (girders, turrets, magnets, etc.) are more durable but they also deal reduced damage.
[/list]
Weapons variety is largely the same as in Revolution from the traditional bazooka to some of the more wacky ones, many of which have multiple uses, like the Lightning Strike allowing you to heal worms, resurrect dead ones, convert turrets and activate inactive mines and magnets. Unlike classic Worms and Armageddon the Ninja Rope functions more like a rope than a mix between a rope and a ladder, meaning you'll weigh it down and have to use your momentum to swing around. Other mobility items, both old and new to the genre, include such items as Jetpack, Water Jetpack and Teleport Gun to name but a few.

As far as gameplay goes Clan Wars is an optimized Revolution meaning no lag when water sloshes about. However, both games are made in the same engine which limits animations to 30 frames per second regardless of what fps the actual game runs on. Note the game itself can run above 30 fps; only the worm animations are limited.

So all in all I think it's one of the freshest Worms games out there since Armageddon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001187390', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1436432635}
review:
Comparés aux autres worms plus fun (armageddon, world party, ...), celui-là est bien différent de par votre équipe (heavy = tank, lent, lourd / soldat = worm normal / scout = super saut, rapide / scientifique = soin a chaque tour) mais aussi de par les énigmes des niveaux en mode campagne.
Autre chose, certains niveaux à différents endroits ne peuvent pas être détruits ainsi que parfois votre worm pourra nager.
L'humour est néanmoins toujours là, la petite musique sympatoche pour alimenter vos kills aussi, un bon moment à passer solo et/ou multi. 

Bon jeu à tous !

review: Wspaniała retrozabawa rodem z kafejek internetowych. Gra warta swej ceny, humor i fajna rozgrywka gwarantowana. Zastanawia mnie tylko optymalizacja produktu, bo mimo że graficznie gra szału nie robi to temperatura karty graficznej oscylują w granicach 80 stopni. Gdy tymczasem w grach z serii Total War 70 stopni, PES 2015 68 stopni, seria Batman od WB - 60-70 stopni. Coś ewidetnie jest nie tak. Jednak rozgrywkę moge polecić.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003477712', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1468435256}
review:
Sehr lustig wenn man mit Freunden daddelt.
Egal ob es die Fails oder die übelsten Luckshots sind.
Mit dem Workshop von Steam hat man auch noch die Möglichkeit das ansich umfangreiche Spiel grenzenlos zu erweitern.

Der einzige Nachteil ist die Engine, denn die FPS sind trotz eines guten PC's nicht sehr stabil.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083912411', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3006, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1734, 'last_played': 1704745108}
review:
Worms Clan Wars ist ein ziemlich lustiges Spiel, indem man (am besten mit seinen Freunden) gegeneinander spielt und versucht, die anderen Würmer zu töten. Der Clan Wars Modus, in dem man, wie der Name schon sagt, einen Clan hat, in dem man zusammen mit einem anderen Spieler des Clans gegen zwei Spieler aus einem anderen Clan kämpft, ist zwar ganz nett gemacht, allerdings benutze ich diesen kaum.

Insgesamt, ein gutes Spiel!

author: {'steamid': '76561198000735363', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 634, 'last_played': 1531068079}
review:
This is without doubt the most hilarious game I've ever played. Never tried online-multiplayer and I don't plan on it either but if you have two or three friends to play with you will definitely have a good time.

Can't say it is a game to play for hours straight but those few matches, only lasting minutes, in between watching series and shooting motherfuckers in csgo is something I've begun to look forward to. For its fullprice at 22eur I can't say it's worth for a cheap guy, but no person shall ever find this game boring.

If you have played any other worms games then you know what the deal is but I cant guarantee this one is the new shit since Armageddon. Really.

8/10 or smthn whereas the last 2pieces are missing due to poor(or hardmanipulated) settings and graphicbugs without understanding.

author: {'steamid': '76561198148673955', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2567, 'last_played': 1528494468}
review:
[h1]Worms Clan Wars[/h1]

[list][u]Pros:[/u]

[*]Single-player mode
[*]Online and local multiplayer
[*]Tons of customization
[*]Tons of unique weapons
[*]Randomly generated stages
[*]Clan wars - 2v2 matches.  Different then the normal free-for-all Worms games
[*]A great amount of replay value
[*]Steam Workshop

[u]Cons:[/u]
[*]Hard to find matches online (not many players)
[*]Only 5 worlds
[*]Single-player mode is boring
[*]Worm classes


[b]8.3 / 10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198040927876', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1439102617}
review:
For a long time I've been waiting for Team 17 to release a working version of Worms World Party that was compatible with a version of Windows beyond 98. I don't really think thats ever going to happen because Team 17 insist that Armageddon reaches feature paritywith WWP before thats possible, and they no longer work on that game.

So, this game is pretty close. It doesn't seem to run that well on my ATI hardware (my computer is fairly rubbish anyway), but its pretty good in terms of being somewhere between the Armageddon kit and the WWP kit. The physics feel pretty spot on. I don't know if thats good or bad, considering the cartoonish tone, but as a whole it all seems to knit quite well. 

Its true that the backgrounds confuse the foregrounds a little, but moving the mouse around tends to resolve the confusion. The museum set idea is cool, and the narrator is quite droll (funny), but the water (bottom border) is a really crappy texture/surface that is entirely unbelievable, particularly in context of the museum set.

I'd give it a 7/10 production value, but as usual, with a Worms game, the real value is in having someone to laugh at your incompetence in trying to kill them. The game seems to do that exceptionally well, and allows hot seat, so it gets atleast one more point for longevity. The online component is deserted, but LAN and hotseat is what this game as always done best anyway. Its an underated gem in the Worms series.

review:
This is one of the most entertaining and challenging real time strategy type games I've played in a long time.  You will undoubtably kill your own worms many times before mastering their attacks and movement.  And that is part of the hilarity of it all.

Overall I give this game 9/10.  The deduction of one point is because I think the worms have a little too much gas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115776624', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 904, 'last_played': 1463789453}
review: Worms is, by far, my favorite PC game. It's easy to play, quick for beginners to pick up, and still challenging even after years of (casual) play. Clan Wars has been nicely done. Beautiful artwork, finally a windowed mode, and plays well cross-platform, unlike the previous versions. I have not tried the Clan side of Clan Wars yet, but this is because I'm busy talking my friends into buying the game so we can.. clan. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198028606450', 'num_games_owned': 253, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1392160741}
review:
This is the first new Worms game I played since Worms 3D, and maybe my memories of the older generations of 2D Worms games have been filtered through nostalgia, but I just remember World Party as much better than this game. The third dimension adds practically nothing to this game, in fact, the game would probably have looked better with high resolution 2D environments instead. The worms have a terrible knack of constantly getting stuck in terrain, even more so than in older installments.

The online rooms are almost devoid of life, maybe because Team17 choose to release new Worms games so close that the community can't keep up support for them. The single player campaign is not very good at all. All the missions have you drudging through linear levels full of annoying mechanisms for your worms to get stuck in. The AI, by the way, hasn't improved at all in the 12 years since World Party either.

I'm not sure about the introductions of specialized classes, it's all right I guess. The only new thing I really enjoy is the water mechanics. That's not enough. It's disappointing, but I could rather just reinstall World Party and play hotseat than keep playing this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145172494', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2852, 'last_played': 1446001619}
review:
I got the four pack with some suitemates in my dorm and might I say this was well worth the 4-odd dollars I had to pay per copy. Among the four of us we had collectively broken 100 hours within the first two weeks.

DOWNSIDE: 
If you can't find friends to play, it can be hard to find a match with more than one opponent. Not enough Clans play and I feel people are really missing out.

UPSIDE:
This game series is and always fun, and this game is no different.
Clan Wars uses four different characters with different movement speeds and damage outputs, and you can have any combination you want... keeping things interesting.
There's always new workshop content such as soundboards, worm outfits, and maps.
Playing with friends is hilarious, especially when that one friend you have that is terrible at these games keeps accidentally committing suicide while parachuting or jetpacking. Alliances will be made, betrayed, and winning is always a curse.
Half 3D maps are visually satisfying and destruction is... a "blast"
Dynamic water/Good weapon choice/physics objects
Not strenuous on your pc

Overall, it's a great game and made better with friends.
I've even considered buying extra copies to get more people playing, but my wallet disagrees...

Get it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198087062262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 523, 'last_played': 1535989231}
review:
being a long time worms fan, I was hoping for a refined and well executed entry. After all, it is basically the same game as previous installments, so you would think they would have got it right by now... unfortuntaly, not quite.
But first, I quite liked the idea of different worm varieties. there are worms that heal themselves and worms around them on their turn, worms that jump and move faster and worms that explode harder when they... die? and they have reduced movement speed, jumping ability and has less jetpack fuel? sure, okay.
It allows for some neat gameplay strategies and adds a well needed extra layer of tactics to worm matches. the physics water is also a neat feature, if not vastly overpowered, especially when using water based weaponry that can make worms slip and drown in the actual 'water' water.
While it's not a bad game, it has many little issues that really hold the game back. The weapons are a little unbalanced and inconsistant. I have never been able to accurately tell how much damage a weapon is going to do: a bazooka hit directly may do 30 damage, or 50. I have never been able to find out why it does this, but it is very infuriating because it puts an extra layer of doubt when planning attacks because you don't know what the move will accomplish: it may destroy a worm or simply critically wound it.
The UI is also an issue. for starters, the aiming reticule is much too big and inaccurate: I would have much preferred a simple dotted line and a small crosshair rather than the over-produced whacky one it has. playing multiplayer has some strange quirks with matchmaking too: you can't start a new game with a player in the same session, you have to back out of a session entirely and start a new one. It is uncesscesarily finicky and awkward.
The singleplayer is also dissapointing. I find it funny that they expect you to go through tutorial stages. I mean it's only been 18 freaking games, I think I got the gist of it by now! I would have liked the option to skip those levels. The narrator (definatly NOT a laura croft spoof) is also a tad annoying, but that is subjective, you may enjoy it. needless to say I do not. otherwise, the singleplayer campaign is just a string of battles with objectives thrown in, usual fair. nothing special at all.
Overall it's a very mediocure entry to the series that feels very unpolished and undercooked. For what it's worth though, despite it's problems, I had fun playing it with mates. If you are willing to overlook it's flaws, it's still at it's core a worms game. But even saying that, there have better worms games before this. Just get Worms: Armageddon Instead.

review:
Like other Worms games, it's an absolute blast (get it?) and as every new release comes out, it gets better and better. I remember playing Worms Armageddon for the Sega Dreamcast, and I thought that was revolutionary game, and from then on, played all the sequels. This game is a huge fun game for wanting to sit down and destroy worms with rocket launchers and grenades. 

9.6/10.0 - Fabulous
-0.4/10 - Some weapons appear to deal no damage at all, but did before.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120419086', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1428160404}
review: Красочная игра с обилием анимации и взрывающихся объектов. Местами притормаживает. Много нового оружия с обновленной физикой (по сравнению с версией Armageddon). Некоторые, например ближнего боя (fire punch, baseball bat), требуют доработки. Ninja Rope перестал быть деревянным, поэтому к любимой веревке придется заново привыкать. Поклонников данной серии игр порадует новый режим прохождения - Story - интересные миссии продуманы с учетом специфики каждого червя. Рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561197977752882', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1448909369}
review: No controller support on Linux which was not obvious when buying the game makes this an immediate uninstall for me. What a pity since Worms Reloaded does work with a controller.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065343522', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5971, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4314, 'last_played': 1678567173}
review:
Für lustige Abende mit Freunden, ob lokal oder übers Internet, immer ein Highlight.
Leider ist aber die Performance nicht die beste und es scheint als werden keine Bugs mehr gefixt.

Spaßfaktor: 10/10
Technik: 5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198072445682', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 955, 'last_played': 1602679827}
review:
Gra ogólnie jest naprawdę fajna ale posiada jeden gigantyczny minus i nie chodzi mi tu o częste lagowanie.
Nie ma możliwości wyboru gdzie chcemy grać a dokładniej, czy na serwerach polskich amerykańskich czy po prostu światowych.
Możemy grać tylko na polskim serweeze co wiąże się z tym, że praktycznie nie da się rozpocząć rozgrywki, samo oczekiwanie trwa conajmniej 5 razy dłużej niż sama gra, do której dołączy max 3 graczy na 4 dostępne miejsca.
Nie będę już nawet wspominał o tym, że próba grania w nocy albo innym czasie kiedy większości Polaków nie ma przy komputerach jest niemożliwa.

JEŚLI KTOŚ WIE JAK USTAWIĆ SOBIE OPCJĘ GRANIA NA ZAGRANICZNYCH SERWERACH, NIECH KONIECZNIE DA ZNAĆ.

review: I have never played worms before, but I have seen videos of it and it looks very fun; however after buying this game I couldn't get into a single online game.  I am very dissapointed that there is never anyone online.  The single player is pretty boring and runs on pretty low FPS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035297348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1423280101}
review:
*I have not played other versions such as revolution, nor do I play any sort of single player mode.  I play this with friends online.That being said, we have fun with it.  

If you can get it cheap and you don't already have other versions of the game then it is worth getting.  It is a turn-based game (turns are timed, so watch out) where you try to knock out your opponents.  The wide variety of weapons are not complex, but you can make them more effective with proper strategy.  Multi-player seems relatively smooth and the variety of maps has lead us to play this game over and over again.  A single round is reletively quick.  We play this game while we chat or while waiting on other people to show up to play more time intensive games.  It seems to be playable by a wide experience range.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998773543', 'num_games_owned': 1686, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 559, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 487, 'last_played': 1427750776}
review:
Die grundsätzlich schlechten Wertungen kann ich nur teilweise nachvollziehen. Auf der einen Seite: Klar, es kommt nicht an die Übersichtlich- und Einfachheit der "echten" 2D-Vorgänger, insbesondere "Armageddon" mit Patches, ran. Aber von allen 3D-Teilen, inklusive "Reloaded", ist "Worms Clan Wars" die beste Reinkarnation der Würmer. Wer sich zwischen Reloaded, Revolution und Clan Wars entscheiden will, macht mit Clan Wars meiner Meinung nach die beste Wahl... Wem Grafik und nicht vorhandene Gamepad-Unterstützung egal ist, macht hingegen mit Armageddon immernoch den größten Glücksgriff...

Team17 hatte mit dem Zeitpunkt der Veröffentlichung von Clan Wars einfach Pech: Erst gabs mit Reloaded einen Schritt in die richtige Richtung für alte Fans, nur um sich mit Revolution vollends wieder von der Fanbasis zu entfernen: Statt der 8 geforderten Würmer pro Team gabs weiterhin nur 4, das ideale Tempo wurde gedrosselt, stattdessen wurden Klassen eingeführt, die aber das Spielgeschehen mangels darauf ausgerichteter Karten kaum beeinflusst haben. Leidlich witzige Cutscenes wurden eingebaut und DLCs mit Waffenpacks verkauft... Kurzum: Alles fühlte sich schlechter an. Sämtliche alteingesessene Fans, die sich Revolution kauften, waren bitter enttäuscht, weil Team17 mit Revolution genau den entgegengesetzten Weg ging.

Warum ich das schreibe? Weil ich glaube, dass das die überwiegend negativen Rezensionen von Clan Wars erklären könnte: Nach Revolution wollte ich von Worms auch nichts mehr wissen, nichtmal in einem 5€-Deal, weil ich dachte, Team17 geht weiterhin nicht auf die Community zu. Erst, als ich von Spielern Anderes hörte, schlug ich zu: Team17 hat tatsächlich aus den Fehlern von Revolution gelernt: Endlich gibts wieder 8 Würmer pro Team, die dreisten DLCs wurde durch die Steam-Workshop-Integration ausgetauscht, Individualisierungsoptionen gibts nun wieder en Masse. Die Landschaften können größer und vielfältiger konfiguriert werden als jemals zuvor. Die Musik ist sogar wieder an den alten Melodien der 2D-Vorgänger angelehnt. Team17 hat "nur" den Fehler gemacht, während der Veröffentlichung niemandem was davon zu sagen. Ich verstehe nicht, warum; hätte ich von den Verbesserungen vorher gewusst, hätte ich diesen Worms-Teil vermutlich sogar zum Releasezeitpunkt gekauft gehabt. Wenn man sieht, wie schlecht sich Clan Wars verkauft hat, war ich wohl nicht der einzige, der so gedacht hat...

Auf alle Fälle, um nochmal die Essenz meiner Review rauszuziehen: Wer die "echten" 2D-Teile nicht spielen will, macht mit Clan Wars meiner Meinung nach die beste Wahl aller "Pseudo-3D"-Worms-Teile. Wer auch mit den "echten" 2D-Teilen keine Probleme hat, sollte lieber zu "Armageddon" greifen, der spielerisch der beste Worms-Teil ist, aber leider keine Gamepad-Unterstützung bietet...

author: {'steamid': '76561198070180492', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 880, 'last_played': 1451601021}
review:
Worms Clan Wars - strategiczna gra turowa polegająca na zniszczeniu przeciwnych drużyn, wchodzona w skład serii gier worms. Najprościej mówiąc wormsy to robaki korzystające z wszelkiego dostępnego uzbrojenia. Gra posiada możliwości rozgrywania kampanii, grania multiplayer, tworzenia klanu do którego mogą dołączyć nasi znajomi czy też edytowanie naszej drużyny robaków (nazw czy też wyglądu). Niestety cena trochę niszczy tą grę powodując małe community co doprowdza do długiego czasu oczekiwania na przeciwników w trybie multiplayer. Gra jest bardzo zabawna, zwłaszcza jak się gra z znajomymi. Warta zakupu, polecam.

[b]
Grafika: 7.5/10
Animacje: 8.5/10
Muzyka: 7/10
Grywalność: 8/10 [/b] 
[h1] OGÓLNA OCENA: 8/10 [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197993882806', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1444000936}
review:
Erstmal vorweg: Ich bin noch ein Anhänger des alten Worms 2 Spiels, besitze selbst Worms Armageddon und Worms: Revolution. Dazu bin ich nur Gelegenheitsspieler und erhebe keinen besonderen Anspruch am Worms, da es für mich nur um zocken mit Freunden und um knifflige Kampangen geht.

Zu den Pros:
+ Steamworkshop (wirklich gut gelungen, auch wenn das Importieren nur nach einem Neustart funktioniert)
+ Wasser (ein neues taktisches Element, kann Würmer wegspülen/ertränken für 5 Schaden pro Runde)
+ Online Unsterstützung (theoretisch benötigt man kein Hamachi o.ä. mehr)
+ Clan Funktion (Man kann einen Clan gründen/beitreten und auf einer Tabelle via Matchmaking nach oben klettern)

-+ Neue Optik (Sieht zwar nett aus, aber für den Preis hab ich Spiele gesehn die besser dastehen)
-+ Pseudo 3D (Kanten auf denen man steht kann man nicht mehr erkennen und Klippingfehler bringen so manchen Würmern den Tod)

- Preisleistung (hab das Spiel im Angebot gekauft ca. 5€ statt 20€, 20€ hätte ich nicht dafür gezahlt, 5€ sind noch erträglich)
- Multiplayer (Jeder wichtige Worms-Titel lässt es zu mit Freunden gegen Computer spielen zu lassen, hier fehlt es)
- Multiplayer (Mal eben mit 2 Freunden spielen via Internet? Viel zu umständlich muss man eine Lobby für das Spiel öffnen und darauf achten schnell genug beizutreten oder die Teamgröße passen einzurichten oder man hat Randombobs im Team)

Fazit: Hätte gut werden können, leider fehlen Eintsellungen für die Waffen (stärke usw.), die Grafik hätte zeitgemäßer ausfallen können, würde im vergleich zu Worms:Reloaded(2010 u. 20€) trotz der Funktionen sehr viel schlechter ausfallen. Müsste ich das Spiel für 20€ kaufen, würd ich kotzen.

PS.: Das Ninja-Seil ist 1. Hässlich 2. Unzuverlässig 3. Ein verbessertes Bungee-Seil
Ich schüttle nur den Kopf, vorallem weil sie es ja schonmal besser konnten (ja Team17 ihr habt euch keine zeit für das Spiel genommen, aber auch verständlich wenn man fast jedes Jahr ein Worms für das Handy/Pc raushaut, da hätte ich auch keine Zeit was gutes zu zaubern, vorallem wenn ich schon viel praktische erfahrung und eine große fangemeinde hat die man ausschlachten kan ;) )

author: {'steamid': '76561198181733581', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1425380001}
review: En tant que fan de la série, ce jeu m'a déçu. Graphiquement, une sorte de mélange 2D/3D n'apporte rien au gameplay, qui reste limité par rapport aux premiers opus (et surtout à Worms World Party). Cependant, le jeu parvient (et heureusement) à faire passer un bon moment en multi. Pour ma part, je reste sur les Worms des années 2000 qui sont à mes yeux beaucoup mieux réussis.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028719903', 'num_games_owned': 7606, 'num_reviews': 286, 'playtime_forever': 1067, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 935, 'last_played': 1607278279}
review:
Вполне хорошая часть со своими плюсами.
Очень хочется иногда оставить негативный отзыв из-за дичайше грубой физики.
Похоже на то, что взятый из Worms 3D движок, и просто развернутый в профиль.

Были уже такие моменты, что... Стоишь на краю, выбираешь пушку из меню. И пока выбираешь твой червь хряк и падает.

Кроме того в игре есть баги. По себе запомнил баг 14-й миссии из-за "неверного порядка" заданий.
Вспоминая WA и WWP хочется так же осудить некоторые моменты физики, вроде работы каната.
В остальном всё нравится, кастомизация, миссии, оружие, оформление всего, игровая физика воды. (и ухудженная физика огня -.- ).
Графически ушли вперед, но вот идейно много потеряли, поэтому впечатления смешанные.

Its really good to play Worms again for those years.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141983663', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1425773913}
review:
I am really disappointed. The graphics and the reviews sounded OK, so i bought the game. It was not _that_ cheap, so i have to warn the people. I am a fan of Worms, i think the Armageddon is the best for PC. I have a good PC, so my experience with this game has nothing to do with my config or drivers.

What i really disliked: 
 - horrible input lag, around 500ms !
 - bad visuals
 - auto-scrolling is stuttering, with or without vsync on...
 - stupid story...who needs it in a Worms game ?!

Positive things:
 - i can't really mention, if you really want to play Worms you should get the Armageddon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055338667', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 2135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1277, 'last_played': 1621738587}
review:
While the community is not as lively as it could or should be, and prior entries to the season (such as Armageddon) are going strong to this day; as a whole, Worms Clan Wars may be the best 2D Worms title yet. Expanding on Revolution's physics-based combat, especially dynamic water, this is a game that requires a change in strategy from say, Worms Reloaded. For example, in Worms Clan Wars, when a grenade is thrown anywhere that is not completely flat land, it rolls. Typically in an older Worms title, grenades would not be nearly as affected by gravity. This makes combat either much easier, or much harder, depending on how you are at the game. Either way, it requires a bit of getting used to.

Clan Wars' strength lies in its customization. While Mac users are out of luck currently regarding the Steam Workshop, everyone has open access to the in-game level editor, which is excellent and very easy to use thanks to a selection of brush and line tools which make precise editing simple.

Unfortunately this is a game, and an entire series that shines with its multiplayer; but the community is lacking, as of now. So, unless you have friends to play with, you may want to get Armageddon instead.

If that's not an issue, by all means buy this. Especially on its current $6 sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978197359', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1456332302}
review:
Game looks like it would be a lot of classic worms fun but I never got that far as the game runs with such terrible performance on my PC that I cannot play. Before people ask yes I do have a decent gaming rig. Not the top of the line but if I'm able to play: BF4, Borderlands PS, and AC Unity I'm sure it "should" be capable of handling the graphics on this game even if on lowest settings. However after checking obvious things like drivers/updates reinstalling and such I was unable to get this game to run on reliable framerates above 15. I opened a ticket with Team17 and one of their reps did exchange emails with me to troubleshoot the issue (briefly) but in the end i was told:

"Thank you for attempting all of the actions which we have previously recommended.
At this point, it sounds as though you might be one of the unfortunate handful who are experiencing a yet unresolved performance issue with particular system configurations. 
Please know that you information has been raised to the appropriate team and should be reviewed shortly. 
Our apologies for any inconvenience that this issue may be causing you in the meantime."

This was back in November of 2014....still nothing was done to help address this performance issue. Until this is resolved I wouldn't recommending purchasing this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038886680', 'num_games_owned': 407, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 3063, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2981, 'last_played': 1428865894}
review: Worms clan wars in my opinion was one the best games in the franchise, but I cannot safely reccomend this game. It IS an amazing game, and I would DEFINITELY reccomend it if you have friends to play it with, but the online community has long since died, and there is almost nobody playing anymore. If that was not the case I would be able to safely reccomend this game. Try some of their other games, as they have more active communities

author: {'steamid': '76561198045631291', 'num_games_owned': 286, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1750, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 525, 'last_played': 1534626768}
review:
Einfach nur 1. Klasse.
Die Steuerung ist identisch zum vorgänger Revolution.
Die Grafik wurde überarbeitet und die Performance stark verbessert.
Es liegt sehr viel Detail in der Story und es macht sehr viel spaß gegen oder mit Freunden zu spielen!
Meiner Meinung nach sind es aber zu wenige Map Designs, die zudem auch noch alle recht gleich aussehen.
Wenn man sich ein wenig mit Worms auskennt, weiß man, was es so für Waffen gibt.
Manche wurden hier ausgelassen, dafür aber neue hinzugefügt. Ich würde mich aber trotzdem auf ein paar neue freuen.
Die Freude nimmt auf Dauer ein wenig ab.

Wer sich also das Spiel kaufen möchte, sollte sich überlegen ob er es lieber alleine spielen möchte oder mit freunden :D
Es gibt ja auch ein 4er Paket was sich bei Aktionen wirklich lohnt.

Ich sags mal so.
23 Euro würde ich hier für nicht ausgeben wollen.
Man muss das Spiel zwar haben, aber 23 Euro sind mir persönlich zu viel.

Tipp: Wartet auf ein Angebot. Das Spiel gibt es dann meistens für 5 Euro zu holen. Die sind es auf jeden Fall wert! :)

Ich hab mir gleich das komplette Worms Paket für 23 Euro geholt :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198055466214', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 502, 'last_played': 1541447873}
review: Die Worms-Reihe ist eine lustig gestaltete und amüsante Art von Spiel, welche sich besonders mit Freunden gut genießen lässt. Das gegenseite Verspotten und beglückwünschen macht nach schwierigen Schüssen und gleichermaßen verfehlten Blindgängern Spaß und gute Laune. Der Teil "Clan Wars" bietet viele verschieden Items, Freiheit, was gestaltung der Maps und Spieleinstellungen angeht und sowohl einen Funktionierenden Multiplayer als auch einen Singleplayer. Die Graphik ist nicht grandios, ist aber devinitiv verkraftbar. Ich empfehle es allen Leuten, die Kollegen zum Spielen haben. Einzelgängern würde ich eher ein anderes Spiel ans Herz legen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071931829', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1682678129}
review:
Also ich persönlich bin ein Fan des Spiels geworden. Damals auf den DS noch Worms gespielt und heute am PC. Viele coole neue und viele geile alte Waffen machen das Spiel praktisch komplett :D
Gute Steuerung, gute Engine...passt ^^
Das einzige was mir fehlt sind viell. mehr Kartendesigns (wie Hochkant) und mehr Schemas (also wie Inka etc.).
(Und viell. kann mir das ja einer sagen, aber meine Statistik zählt meine Käpfe usw. nicht mit .-.
Weiß einer warum das so ist?)

author: {'steamid': '76561198082949447', 'num_games_owned': 141, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1422752767}
review:
Столкновения просчитываются криво, черви натыкаются на невидимые препятствия, там где их нет - наоборот застряют, веревкой пользоваться невозможно, управление забаговано, экран уезжает кудато если открыть выбор оружия двигая перед этим камерой, графика на максимуме на мониторе 2560x1440 выглядит КОШМАРНО, сплошное мыло и "лесенки" пикселей. 
После Armageddon и Reloaded играть в ЭТО невозможно... Выкинутые деньги. В очередной раз убеждаюсь, что сначала с торентов качать надо, потом уже покупать если понравлось. Не делая демо версии разработчки не оставляют выбора...

author: {'steamid': '76561197986805120', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1387646151}
review:
I don't like it, just my personal opinion. It's the exact same game as Worms Revolution which was released 10 months earlier, but the new menu screen, weapon selection, interface and narrator are so displeasing to me that I'd rather play the old version. Worms Clan Wars feels like an unintended step backwards.

I am, however, eagerly awaiting Team17's next Worms game. Like clockwork, they've been releasing a solid title, followed by terrible one for decades now. It's no different from the 95/NT/98/2000/XP/Vista/7/8 pattern.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966436747', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1515811395}
review:
Irgendwie kommt das richtige Worms-Feeling der alten Titel hier nicht mehr auf.

Ein großer Minuspunkt ist die Ungenauigkeit: Man kann mit der Schrotflinte quasi durch seinen Gegner durch durch die Mauer schießen (ohne den Gegner zu treffen). Alleine der Punkt mindert den Spielspaß leider schon enorm.

Das Menü an sich wirkt leider auch sehr unübersichtlich. Wer schonmal versucht hat, ein normales LAN-Spiel zu eröffnen, weiß vermutlich, wovon ich rede.

Alles in allem leider kein Vergleich zu den alten Titeln.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970622271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1420900983}
review:
Leider ein weiterer Flop.
Jeder der Worms2, Worms Armageddon oder Worms World Party gespielt hat wird stark enttäusch werden von diesem Titel.

> Das Gameplay ist sehr langsam. 
> Die Maus hat eine eigene Mausbeschleunigung, was sehr unangenehm ist.
> Die Grafik ist zwar schick, aber sehr unübersichtlich (Wenn man reinzoomt erkennt man alles gut, hat aber keine übersicht, wenn man rauszoomt wird alles mikroskopisch klein)
> Es gibt die alten Sprünge nicht mehr (nur noch vorwärts und backflip) und die Steuerung zu ändern ist sehr aufwändig (Gibt dauernd konflikte).
> Im Wormnet ist nichts los. Es gab als ich mich gerade eingeloggt hatte gerade mal 3 offene Partien.
> Das Ninjaseil ist leider immer noch eine Zumutung.
> Bei vielen Crasht das Spiel beim ersten Start. Oft hilft Windows Media Codecs runterzuladen und zu installieren, oder einstellungen im NVidia Treiber ändern. Warum macht das Setup das nicht automatisch ? 

Fazit: Leider nicht für Worms Fans geeignet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035268822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1489867040}
review:
It's a sheeeeetload of new and improved features!  Working phyics, weapons based on physics, campaign full of phyics puzzles, classes, gamepad controls, internet multiplayer, etc.
However if you want more fun, you should stick with worms world party (unfortunately it is not on steam, but worms armageddon is, although modes are less customizable). And if you require hot-seat alcoparty mode you hould stick with WWP.

GAme is till much wore than the original (duology? triology? quadriology?)

author: {'steamid': '76561198094842756', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 744, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1477591332}
review:
Personalmente me encanta, hay mucho purista que está acostumbrado a esa cuerda ninja OP que puede moverte por todo el escenario y ahora es lo que es: Una cuerda para balancearte. Si bien es cierto que cuesta dominarla y que no impulsa tanto como te gustaría sirve para lo que fue creada, es decir, balancearte de un lado a otro (Doh). Al margen de esto me parece un gran juego, los mapas aunque solo tengan 6 modelos para escoger son guapisimos, las armas mejor, además son mapas muy grandes que engañan a la vista y esto hace que el juego se vuelva aún más estratégico, sobre todo como dije antes por el implemento de nuevos armamentos y accesorios que bien te recuperan vida por el tiempo, un búfalo que arrasa con todo lo que pilla, el agua se vuelve super importante y tiene unas dinámicas y físicas increibles, un canal de desague para no ahogarte... mucho, muchisimo ofrece este juego por no mencionar de que puedes customizar tus propios sombreros (aunque yo aún no se como descargarme el programa ni donde buscarlo para poder empezar a crear los mios xD) y accesorios, además de que hay muchos ya creados por fans muy chulos. Nota: Los 4 de D&D son simplemente increbiles jajaja. 

LA GRAN PEGA es que este juego no lo juega casi ni cristo, ahora que estuvo en rebajas se volvió a ver a gente pero las salas están casi siempre vacías y jugar una guerra de clan es casi imposible... salvo esto considero a esta junto con Revolution la mejor entrega de Worms.

P.d: Si eres muy purista con la cuerda olvidate, si no, este es con diferencia el mejor Worms de todos!

author: {'steamid': '76561198019487666', 'num_games_owned': 843, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 1319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 901, 'last_played': 1688455759}
review:
Great game for the Worms series! Its 3D but keeps the old worms 2D on the side style (making it a 2.5D game) and with new and old classic weapons to choose from, anyone whos played any of the Worms game is sure to enjoy this!

Its got a nice little story mode that with each level shows you how the game plays that will help you beat some of the harder levels, there is also Local CO-OP multiplayer mode with also online multiplayer which all seem to run great!

You get to edit your teams, they have different types of worm such as heavy (take more damage then the average worm) scout (runs and jumps far but is small and weaker) scientist (gives 5hp each time its a scientist worm's turn to the whole team) and then the average worm which is a soilder class/rank each all play a part of winning the match and not just relying on luck and good shots. But thats not all, you get to chose their victory dance, their voice (soundbank) what they wear such as hats, glasses or facial hair and even selecting your type of fort for your team with plenty of options for each category.

Steam Workshop is also supported for the game so there is heaps of content that you can add to your teams customization, you can add more content such as gravestones, hats, glasses, trinkets, mustaches, soundbanks and even levels!

If your a fan of Worms from the 90s or weather you started when it first went 3D or even just thinking of trying one, Worms Clan Wars is def worth giving a go!

author: {'steamid': '76561198164695766', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2540, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1791, 'last_played': 1628107503}
review:
Well this game isn't exactly bug- or  lag-free, but it at least is fun. This is one of the funniest unrealistic battle games you can get out there, being worms who are smacking each other with holy hand grenades, banana bombs, super sheep or even concrete donkeys. There is also the option to customize your worm, from their looks to how they talk. Just like any other fighting game, don't try this at home IRL. Especially not if you really are a worm.

My score: 7

author: {'steamid': '76561198006462480', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1420400885}
review:
This has been a ton of fun for the last few hours.

For everyone seeking a new and "complete" experience or anyone who enjoyed "Worms: Armageddon" at it's time and wants to relive that memory- this is it basically.

Once  you get over the fact that they still have not figured out how to make the ninja-rope fun again, you will find yourself enjoying a solid Worms-game with a few extra features that make sense.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982023906', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 508, 'last_played': 1439707021}
review: Bought a 4 pack and handed it out to friends. So far we have enjoyed every match... A few bugs here and there but nothing to not laugh at (its supposed to be a fun game anyways)  Love all the old weapons and some of the new.  (still have to get used to the new ones)  I also like the 4 classes and how they work.  Note that since this game is 3d you cant just run it on any old PC.  my only complaint would be online games seem to be lacking players....but to me Qorms isn't a game you play everyday all day so i can understand the lobbys aren't full all the time.  Glad i bought the 4 pack :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198008272355', 'num_games_owned': 1839, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1585, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 876, 'last_played': 1515011356}
review:
Worms Clan Wars macht Spaß zu spielen, bietet allerdings nicht sonderlich viele Erneuerungen zu Worms Revolution. Wie der Name schon sagt ist eine der wichtigsten Erneuerungen der Clan Wars. Hier kann man sich mit Freunden einen Worms Clan erstellen (aus den bereits aus Worms Revolution bekannten Klassen: Soldier, Scout, Scientist und Heavy) und dann in einer Clan Liga an die Spitze spielen. Ganz nett, aber meiner Meinung nach nix wirklich besonderes. Auch der Multiplayer funktioniert gut, was aber schon immer bei Worms ohne Probleme funktioniert hat. Von der Grafik und den Stimmen her wurde es von Worms Revolution übernommen und zeigt auch hier nichts Neues.

Aber allen die sich nach einiger Zeit gelangweilt haben immer nur die Kämpfe zu machen, kann ich sagen:

Worms hat mit Worms Clan Wars endlich mal eine Story hinten dran!

Der Single-Modus wurde komplett erneuert. Es gibt eine Story die von einer Art Wurm-Lara-Croft erzählt wird. Ihr müsst eine Karotte zurück holen mit der ein böser Wurm seine Hypnosefähigkeiten verbessern will um so die Gedanken aller Würmer zu kontrollieren. Also kämpft ihr euch von Level zu Level, in denen es nicht immer nur darum geht den Feind zu besiegen, sondern auch eure Kameraden zu befreien oder mit Hilfe von minimaler Ausrüstung am geschicktesten durch eine Welt zu kommen. 

Natürlich wurden auch Checkpoints eingebaut und man findet auch die beliebten Waffen aus Armageddon wieder. Das Waffenmenü wurde aufgeräumt und ist übersichtlicher und es sind neue Waffen hinzugekommen. Alle die das alte Waffenmenü bevorzugen können die Ansicht in den Einstellungen ändern.

Fazit:
Worms Clan Wars erfindet das Rad nicht mehr ganz so neu wie es Revolution getan hat. Dennoch bietet es einiges neues und einen Story-Modus, was es auch für Besitzer von Revolution kaufenswert macht, selbst wenn man sich nicht wirklich mit den Clans befassen will.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014788793', 'num_games_owned': 1156, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 1793, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1725, 'last_played': 1417940682}
review:
Lets just say maybe you don't have a clue what "Worms" is. I think this is HIGHLY unlikely, and certainly embarrassing for you if that is true in anyway possible. The Worms of a decade ago is much the same as the Worms of today, with newer titles adding a few spins and twists on the classic formula but generally sticking to what made it work all these years to go 

Basically its just all the lovely new features from Worms Revolution have been retained by its wriggling, younger sibling: classes, water, and physics. Combatants are split up into soldiers, scouts, scientists, and heavies, all with different movement speeds, health, and special abilities, like the scientist worm's knack for healing his chums. They've been tweaked and balanced since Revolution, with area of effects for special abilities being added or increased.

What makes Clan Wars above its predecessors is the effort that has been put into multiplayer. There's local multiplayer, then your standard online PvP, but the truly special, properly new addition is the titular clan feature. With the same tools used to make a team of deadly, slimy worm-warriors, you can put together a whole clan, with a distinct appearance along with a shiny emblem and a clan name, and then recruit members to this clan, not that it matters at all since the pvp on this title is most likely dead or with 1-10 players.

Ultimately, its success lies in its ability to maintain a healthy population, which certainly won't happen if Team 17 keep churning out more Worm titles, so one hopes that they will take a breather. If Revolution was the best that Worms had ever been then this definently is a title worth having.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965409772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1708813821}
review:
Instead of adding the new stuff introduced in this game to Worms Revolution Team17 decided to make another new Worms game, which is even not as good as Worms Revolution. To be honest, it almost feels like a beta version of Worms Revolution.

Here are just some negative points in this game:
- You can not zoom the camera to the point you want, for me it's either too close or too far, which makes it difficult to play this game. In Worms Revolution it was easy to zoom the camera to the point I enjoyed.
- Fat worms leave a massive explosion behind, feels unbalanced
- Whats the point with the name? Worms is not meant to be a clan-game.
- The environments are not as interesting as in Worms Revolution and they even don't look as good. Sadly they did not include the environment from Worms Revolution in this game.

I like most of the new weapons they have included and I also like Steam Workshop support but that is almost it. There is no reason to play this game because Worms Revolution is much more fun. I think the time they spent creating this should have been used to improve the good concept of Worms Revolution.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041488652', 'num_games_owned': 28, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 906, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1434702497}
review: Ich bin ein Neuling, wenn es um Worms geht, aber ich kann sagen, dass es sicherlich nicht zu den Guten teilen der Serie gehört. Die Serverbrowser sind leer, die Bots sind entweder unfair oder extrem dumm, die Singleplayer Kampange ist am Anfang viel zu leicht und wird dann schlagartig zu schwer, das  Spiel läuft fast nicht auf alten Computern, und mann kann manchmal nicht zwischen Hintergrund und Boden unterscheiden. Man sollte es nur kaufen, wenn es ein paar leute haben, die mann kennt und mit denen man zusammen spielen kann.

review:
Ich finde dieses Spiel einfach nur genial.Also mit Freunden bockt es richtig hard.Die Story finde ich auch ganz nett anzuschauen und ja was ich nicht verstehe warum manche Leute das Game als schlecht bewertern.Ich nenne euch mal Gründe warum die das machen: 1.Sie haben einen schlechten Pc und können Worms warscheinlich ned flüssig zocken.
2.Sie haben einfach keine Freunde mit denen sie das Game scuhten können.
3.Sie sind echte Grafikhuren also ich finde die Grafik ziemlich nice zwar net so wie bei Battlefield4 aber nice und es soll auch keine Bf4 Grafik haben es ist nunmal kein Ego-Shooter sondern ein Game was man mit Freunden so zwischendurch zockt weil es einfach bockt.
4.Sie hassen Worms generell.
Ja Leute das war mein Review ich finde dieses Spiel einfach ziemlich gut holt es euch es ist einfach ein muss.#

review:
Я нашёл в этой игре только 2 минуса:
1. Не переведено на русский язык (конечно, можно играть и без этого, пушки например различать по картинкам, а новыми в дуэлях пользоваться и тестировать их)
2. В связи с тем, что мелкий теперь на мины не реагирует, ему нет смысла их кидать. Но есть такие шапки, что из-за них не поймёшь: умник это или мелкий. я даю игре свою привычную оценку: 9\10 (ничто не идеально).

author: {'steamid': '76561198018791888', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1573842765}
review: Я играю в вормс с 2002 года. Играл во все части. Что могу сказать. Игра не дароботана. Самая лучшая часть ан данный момент это вормс революшн. Едиснтвенный плюс у этой игры это что карта увеличина на 30 процентов. А так все фигня. Даже графика хуже чем в революшн. Хотя движок игры тот же. но все тупо хуже. Если вормс революшн на полном экране идет без тормозов то эта тормозит. Плюс когда меню открываешь с оружием камера куда-то уходит. И сами текстуры прорисованны хуже чем в революшн. Впринципе это можно понять ибо она для онлйн сделана может в этом суть. но та же революшн тоже для онли была. Крч купить можно . будем надеятся на обновления. Пока что революшн это лучшее что мне удалосьь повидать

review: I was enormously let down by this game. First of all, all I get in-game is a black screen, so there's definitely some bug in the visuals. Secondly, there is no versus mode between teams that is not Deathmatch. In fact, creating new teams is needlessly complicated, as the game automatically creates one for you using your Steam name. Why can't it just use the Armageddon principle? This game is not at all structured like older Worms games, so those of you wanting an updated Worms experience in the reign of Armageddon, stay away. At least I got this game on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026374408', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1414612001}
review:
Vorweg, ich habe einige Wormstitel gespielt und bin quasi Worms-Spieler erster Stunde. 

Dieser Teil ist ein schöner Versuch von Team17 die Wormsreihe voran zu bringen. Jedoch mit fraglichem Erfolg.
Ohne lang rumzuschwafeln; Worms Armageddon ist und bleibt das beste Worms der Reihe.
Wer "Armageddon" genau so gut fand wie ich, wird entäuscht sein von "Clan Wars" und vom Spielspaß her ist selbst das klassische "Worms " besser als "Clan Wars. Zwar gibt es einige durchaus positive Aspekte, jedoch werden diese durch die Negativen seiten ziemlich egalisiert.

Positives zu Worms Clan Wars:
+ Einen Haufen alter und neuer Waffen
+ Große bewegliche Elemente wie Felsbroken, oder ähnliches
+ Möglichkeit die Würmer zu individualisieren mit Team outfits, etc...
+interessantes Kisten System, man findet auch Münzen mit denen man Munition etc kaufen kann
+Leveleditor und nette fertige Leveldesigns

Negatives zu Worms Clan Wars:
-grafisch total überladen, zu bunt, zu wischiwaschi
-Vieles wurde versucht durch "3D"-animierte Würmer, Waffen, Welten etc... aufzupeppen, was mir aber in einem klassischen 2D Spiel überflüssig erscheint.
-Durch diese ganzen graphischen Neuerungen verliert das Spiel an Performance und Spieldynamik und somit ist es eher sehr nervig.
-Auch die Würmer wirken eher träge und ungenau in der Steuerung, was die Trägheit des ganzen Spiels die Krone aufsetzt.

Den Multiplayer weder Online noch Offline habe ich nicht getestet, weils einfach im Singleplayer schon so öde ist.

Wer wirklich gerne und viel Worms spielt, sollte auf "Worms Armaggedon" zurückgreifen und dabei bleiben. Definitiv keine Kaufempfehlung für "Worms Clan Wars"

author: {'steamid': '76561197970412942', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1412531650}
review:
Worms Clan Wars seems to be a really good game. The weapons, controls and other features feels good. However, the art style for the levels and background really annoys me.

What really puts me off from playing it, and actually made me buy a 4-pack of Worms Reloaded instead, is the extra layer for the levels that make it really hard to read which has collision and what is pass through. The part you stand on and navigate on has depth, since it's 3d. And that itself can make it slightly hard to judge where a ledge stops. But the real problem is the second layer of the level, which sits directly behind the parts you stand on. That layer also gets destroyed or mostly partly destroyed, creating an even more unreadable level.

Worms Clan Wars has some good things, but my recommendation is to buy Worms Reloaded instead!

author: {'steamid': '76561198045243032', 'num_games_owned': 508, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 5146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3300, 'last_played': 1549938055}
review: It's kinda depressing how many people DONT play this game... I really enjoy it. It is a twist on your typical "tank" turn based player vs player game play. Beyond some of the other games out there, The physics engine in this game 'Yes I said Physics Engine" is pretty remarkable for what it is. The water is basically well... "Water" it doesn't ripple when you shoot it sorta speak. But the brute force of an explotion will send what ever water there is on the map flying, Careful... It will drown you or knock you off the map. The water follows the path of least resistance. It'd be nice if more people played this game. My buddy and I both get on to run a match or two to chekc out the community every night or so. Hell... If people add me I have no problem buying this game for them when it goes on sale if they'll play it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961144963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 869, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 756, 'last_played': 1690104560}
review:
El worms definivo. Team17 al fin supo escuchar lo que los fans deseaban. Han sabido incluir todo lo que tenian los mejores worms en este juego, añadiendo nuevas fisicas, graficos y modos de juego.

No tiene la fama que deberia tener por culpa de tantos fracasos en franquícias anteriores, una pena, ya que el verdadero juego de este juego se le saca con el divertidísimo modo multijugador, donde siempre podrás elegir las reglas mas clásicas de los worms de toda la vida, o las más nuevas con una larga lista de novedades. Lastima que el lobby esté la mayor parte del tiempo vacío.

Un juego que debes tener en tu biblioteca, con un mando logitech o microsoft y sentado en el salon de casa viendo a pantalla completa como destruyes sin piedad a los gusanos de tus amigos.

Nota:  8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197969994326', 'num_games_owned': 1613, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 2549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2025, 'last_played': 1434479298}
review:
The thing that I learned from Worms Clan Wars is.. Proverbs followed by "That's what she said." never get old.

-- Family Play --

Worms Clan Wars has been great fun for our family. Our 4-year old and 9-year old both really love to play this game. I have a long history of worms play, but nobody else really does. That doesn't mean that I'm landing my shots, though.

Worms is a game that is easy to play, but hard to really succeed in. 

I can't speak about the online play. Only how it works in my family. There are a lot of pre-packaged rules and you can customize your worms teams for local or online play.

The graphics are really nice, the single-player campaign is a really nice way to be forced to learn all of the weapons / tools.

My 4-year old loves putting on a jet pack and a parachute and just rocketing as far upwards as possible, then gliding downward.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995175005', 'num_games_owned': 504, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 602, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 587, 'last_played': 1400274636}
review:
This game is in no way optimised for PC, with huge frame rate drops even on the lowest resolutions. In 600x480 it's playable, but the pixels are then so bad that the worms just look like pink blobs.
It's a worms game, however and can still be enjoyable, but Armageddon is a far better choice.

Plus:
- A classic-style Worms game
- Some cool new features to add variety to battles

Negatives
- Mostly unplayable due to bad console porting
- Essentially the same as Worms Armageddon but with a few extra features and far less customisation options
